90using size_type = std::make_unsigned<types::blas_int>::type;
91
100size_type
101generate_random_index(const size_type a, const size_type b);
102
117template <int dim,
118 int spacedim,
119 template <int, typename>
120 typename KernelFunctionType,
121 typename RangeNumberType,
122 typename KernelNumberType,
123 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
124void
125assemble_kernel_row(
126 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
127 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
128 &kernel,
129 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
130 const types::global_dof_index row_dof_index,
131 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &column_dof_indices,
132 const std::vector<
133 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
134 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
135 const std::vector<
136 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
137 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
138 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
139 dim,
140 spacedim,
141 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
142 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
143 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
144 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
145 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
146 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
147 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
148 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
149 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
150 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
151 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
152 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
153 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
154 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
155 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
156 dim,
157 spacedim,
158 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
159 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
160{
161 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
162 static_assert(
163 std::is_same<
164 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
165 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
166
167 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), column_dof_indices.size());
168
169 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index =
170 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
171 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index] :
172 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
173 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index]);
174 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
175
179 for (size_type j = 0; j < column_dof_indices.size(); j++)
180 {
181 j_global_dof_index = (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
182 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]] :
183 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
184 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]]);
185
186 row_vector(j) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_far_field_dofs(
187 kernel,
188 kernel_factor,
189 i_global_dof_index,
190 j_global_dof_index,
191 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
192 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
193 bem_values_gpu,
194 kx_dof_handler,
195 ky_dof_handler,
196 mappings,
197 material_id_to_mapping_index,
198 normal_detector,
199 scratch_data,
200 scratch_data_gpu,
201 copy_data);
202 }
203}
204
205
234template <int dim,
235 int spacedim,
236 template <int, typename>
237 typename KernelFunctionType,
238 typename RangeNumberType,
239 typename KernelNumberType,
240 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
241void
242assemble_kernel_row(
243 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
244 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
245 &kernel,
246 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
247 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
248 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
249 const types::global_dof_index row_dof_index,
250 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &column_dof_indices,
251 const std::vector<
252 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
253 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
254 const std::vector<
255 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
256 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
257 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
258 dim,
259 spacedim,
260 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
261 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
262 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
263 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
264 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
265 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
266 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
267 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
268 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
269 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
270 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
271 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
272 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
273 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
274 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
275 dim,
276 spacedim,
277 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
278 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
279{
280 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
281 static_assert(
282 std::is_same<
283 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
284 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
285
286 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), column_dof_indices.size());
287
288 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index =
289 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
290 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index] :
291 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
292 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index]);
293 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
294
298 for (size_type j = 0; j < column_dof_indices.size(); j++)
299 {
300 j_global_dof_index = (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
301 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]] :
302 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
303 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]]);
304
305 row_vector(j) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_far_field_dofs(
306 kernel,
307 kernel_factor,
308 i_global_dof_index,
309 j_global_dof_index,
310 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
311 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
312 bem_values_gpu,
313 kx_dof_handler,
314 ky_dof_handler,
315 mappings,
316 material_id_to_mapping_index,
317 normal_detector,
318 scratch_data,
319 scratch_data_gpu,
320 copy_data);
321
322 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
323 row_vector(j) += stabilization_factor * vec(row_dof_index) *
324 vec(column_dof_indices[j]);
325 }
326}
327
328
333template <int dim,
334 int spacedim,
335 template <int, typename>
336 typename KernelFunctionType,
337 typename RangeNumberType,
338 typename KernelNumberType,
339 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
340void
341assemble_kernel_row(
342 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
343 dim,
344 spacedim,
345 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
346 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
347 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
348 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
349 &kernel,
350 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
351 const types::global_dof_index row_dof_index,
352 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &column_dof_indices,
353 const std::vector<
354 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
355 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
356 const std::vector<
357 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
358 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
359 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
360 dim,
361 spacedim,
362 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
363 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
364 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
365 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
366 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
367 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
368 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
369 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
370 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
371 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
372 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
373 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
374 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
375{
376 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
377 static_assert(
378 std::is_same<
379 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
380 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
381
382 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), column_dof_indices.size());
383
384 task_buffer.reinit();
385
390 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index =
391 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
392 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index] :
393 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
394 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_index]);
395 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
396
400 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[0] = 0;
401 for (size_type j = 0; j < column_dof_indices.size(); j++)
402 {
403 j_global_dof_index = (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
404 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]] :
405 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
406 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[column_dof_indices[j]]);
407
408 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[j + 1] =
409 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[j] +
410 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
411 create_sauter_quadrature_tasks_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
412 task_buffer,
413 i_global_dof_index,
414 j_global_dof_index,
415 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
416 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
417 mappings,
418 material_id_to_mapping_index,
419 normal_detector,
420 scratch_data,
421 copy_data);
422 }
423
427 task_buffer.process_tasks(row_vector,
428 kernel,
429 kernel_factor,
430 bem_values_gpu,
431 128,
432 128,
433 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
434}
435
436
442template <int dim,
443 int spacedim,
444 template <int, typename>
445 typename KernelFunctionType,
446 typename RangeNumberType,
447 typename KernelNumberType,
448 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
449void
450assemble_kernel_row(
451 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
452 dim,
453 spacedim,
454 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
455 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
456 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
457 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
458 &kernel,
459 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
460 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
461 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
462 const types::global_dof_index row_dof_index,
463 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &column_dof_indices,
464 const std::vector<
465 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
466 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
467 const std::vector<
468 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
469 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
470 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
471 dim,
472 spacedim,
473 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
474 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
475 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
476 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
477 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
478 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
479 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
480 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
481 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
482 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
483 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
484 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
485 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
486{
487 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
488 static_assert(
489 std::is_same<
490 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
491 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
492
493 assemble_kernel_row(task_buffer,
494 row_vector,
495 kernel,
496 kernel_factor,
497 row_dof_index,
498 column_dof_indices,
499 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
500 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
501 bem_values_gpu,
502 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
503 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
504 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
505 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
506 mappings,
507 material_id_to_mapping_index,
508 normal_detector,
509 scratch_data,
510 copy_data);
511
512 for (size_type j = 0; j < column_dof_indices.size(); j++)
513 {
514 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
515 row_vector(j) += stabilization_factor * vec(row_dof_index) *
516 vec(column_dof_indices[j]);
517 }
518}
519
520
549template <int dim,
550 int spacedim,
551 template <int, typename>
552 typename KernelFunctionType,
553 typename RangeNumberType,
554 typename KernelNumberType,
555 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
556void
557assemble_kernel_column(
558 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
559 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
560 &kernel,
561 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
562 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
563 const types::global_dof_index col_dof_index,
564 const std::vector<
565 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
566 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
567 const std::vector<
568 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
569 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
570 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
571 dim,
572 spacedim,
573 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
574 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
575 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
576 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
577 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
578 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
579 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
580 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
581 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
582 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
583 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
584 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
585 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
586 dim,
587 spacedim,
588 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
589 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
590{
591 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
592 static_assert(
593 std::is_same<
594 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
595 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
596
597 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
598
599 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
600 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index =
601 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
602 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index] :
603 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
604 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index]);
605
609 for (size_type i = 0; i < row_dof_indices.size(); i++)
610 {
611 i_global_dof_index = (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
612 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]] :
613 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
614 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]]);
615
616 col_vector(i) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_far_field_dofs(
617 kernel,
618 kernel_factor,
619 i_global_dof_index,
620 j_global_dof_index,
621 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
622 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
623 bem_values_gpu,
624 mappings,
625 material_id_to_mapping_index,
626 normal_detector,
627 scratch_data,
628 scratch_data_gpu,
629 copy_data);
630 }
631}
632
633
661template <int dim,
662 int spacedim,
663 template <int, typename>
664 typename KernelFunctionType,
665 typename RangeNumberType,
666 typename KernelNumberType,
667 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
668void
669assemble_kernel_column(
670 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
671 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
672 &kernel,
673 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
674 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
675 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
676 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
677 const types::global_dof_index col_dof_index,
678 const std::vector<
679 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
680 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
681 const std::vector<
682 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
683 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
684 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
685 dim,
686 spacedim,
687 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
688 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
689 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
690 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
691 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
692 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
693 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
694 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
695 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
696 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
697 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
698 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
699 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
700 dim,
701 spacedim,
702 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
703 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
704{
705 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
706 static_assert(
707 std::is_same<
708 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
709 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
710
711 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
712
713 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
714 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index =
715 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
716 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index] :
717 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
718 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index]);
719
723 for (size_type i = 0; i < row_dof_indices.size(); i++)
724 {
725 i_global_dof_index = (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
726 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]] :
727 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
728 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]]);
729
730 col_vector(i) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_far_field_dofs(
731 kernel,
732 kernel_factor,
733 i_global_dof_index,
734 j_global_dof_index,
735 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
736 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
737 bem_values_gpu,
738 mappings,
739 material_id_to_mapping_index,
740 normal_detector,
741 scratch_data,
742 scratch_data_gpu,
743 copy_data);
744
745 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
746 col_vector(i) +=
747 stabilization_factor * vec(row_dof_indices[i]) * vec(col_dof_index);
748 }
749}
750
751
757template <int dim,
758 int spacedim,
759 template <int, typename>
760 typename KernelFunctionType,
761 typename RangeNumberType,
762 typename KernelNumberType,
763 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
764void
765assemble_kernel_column(
766 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
767 dim,
768 spacedim,
769 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
770 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
771 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
772 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
773 &kernel,
774 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
775 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
776 const types::global_dof_index col_dof_index,
777 const std::vector<
778 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
779 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
780 const std::vector<
781 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
782 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
783 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
784 dim,
785 spacedim,
786 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
787 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
788 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
789 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
790 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
791 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
792 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
793 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
794 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
795 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
796 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
797 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
798 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
799{
800 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
801 static_assert(
802 std::is_same<
803 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
804 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
805
806 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
807
808 task_buffer.reinit();
809
810 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
811 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index =
812 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
813 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index] :
814 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
815 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[col_dof_index]);
816
820 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[0] = 0;
821 for (size_type i = 0; i < row_dof_indices.size(); i++)
822 {
823 i_global_dof_index = (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
824 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]] :
825 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
826 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[row_dof_indices[i]]);
827
828 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[i + 1] =
829 task_buffer.starting_task_indices_for_dof_pairs_cpu[i] +
830 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
831 create_sauter_quadrature_tasks_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
832 task_buffer,
833 i_global_dof_index,
834 j_global_dof_index,
835 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
836 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
837 mappings,
838 material_id_to_mapping_index,
839 normal_detector,
840 scratch_data,
841 copy_data);
842 }
843
847 task_buffer.process_tasks(col_vector,
848 kernel,
849 kernel_factor,
850 bem_values_gpu,
851 128,
852 128,
853 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
854}
855
856
862template <int dim,
863 int spacedim,
864 template <int, typename>
865 typename KernelFunctionType,
866 typename RangeNumberType,
867 typename KernelNumberType,
868 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
869void
870assemble_kernel_column(
871 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
872 dim,
873 spacedim,
874 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
875 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
876 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
877 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
878 &kernel,
879 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
880 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
881 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
882 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
883 const types::global_dof_index col_dof_index,
884 const std::vector<
885 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
886 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
887 const std::vector<
888 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
889 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
890 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
891 dim,
892 spacedim,
893 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
894 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
895 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
896 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
897 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
898 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
899 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
900 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
901 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
902 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
903 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
904 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
905 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
906{
907 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
908 static_assert(
909 std::is_same<
910 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
911 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
912
913 assemble_kernel_column(task_buffer,
914 col_vector,
915 kernel,
916 kernel_factor,
917 row_dof_indices,
918 col_dof_index,
919 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
920 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
921 bem_values_gpu,
922 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
923 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
924 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
925 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
926 mappings,
927 material_id_to_mapping_index,
928 normal_detector,
929 scratch_data,
930 copy_data);
931
932 for (size_type i = 0; i < row_dof_indices.size(); i++)
933 {
934 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
935 col_vector(i) +=
936 stabilization_factor * vec(row_dof_indices[i]) * vec(col_dof_index);
937 }
938}
939
940
973template <int dim,
974 int spacedim,
975 template <int, typename>
976 typename KernelFunctionType,
977 typename RangeNumberType,
978 typename KernelNumberType,
979 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
980size_type
981random_select_ref_row(
982 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
983 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
984 &kernel,
985 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
986 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_row_indices,
987 const size_type current_ref_row_index,
988 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_row_index,
989 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
990 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
991 const std::vector<
992 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
993 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
994 const std::vector<
995 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
996 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
997 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
998 dim,
999 spacedim,
1000 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1001 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1002 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1003 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1004 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1005 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1006 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1007 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1008 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1009 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1010 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1011 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1012 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
1013 dim,
1014 spacedim,
1015 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
1016 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1017{
1018 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1019 static_assert(
1020 std::is_same<
1021 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1022 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1023
1024 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), col_dof_indices.size());
1025
1030 size_type next_ref_row_selection_index;
1034 size_type next_ref_row_index(row_dof_indices.size());
1039 types::global_dof_index next_ref_row_dof_index;
1040
1041 while (!remaining_row_indices.empty())
1042 {
1043 next_ref_row_selection_index =
1044 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_row_indices) - 1);
1045 next_ref_row_index =
1046 value_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1047 next_ref_row_dof_index = row_dof_indices[next_ref_row_index];
1048
1049 if (next_ref_row_index != current_ref_row_index)
1050 {
1054 assemble_kernel_row(row_vector,
1055 kernel,
1056 kernel_factor,
1057 next_ref_row_dof_index,
1058 col_dof_indices,
1059 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1060 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1061 bem_values_gpu,
1062 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1063 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1064 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1065 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1066 mappings,
1067 material_id_to_mapping_index,
1068 normal_detector,
1069 scratch_data,
1070 scratch_data_gpu,
1071 copy_data);
1072
1073 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(row_vector))
1074 {
1080 erase_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1081
1082 continue;
1083 }
1084 else
1085 {
1090 return next_ref_row_index;
1091 }
1092 }
1093 else
1094 {
1095 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 1)
1096 {
1102 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1103 }
1104 else
1105 {
1110 continue;
1111 }
1112 }
1113 }
1114
1115 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1116}
1117
1118
1154template <int dim,
1155 int spacedim,
1156 template <int, typename>
1157 typename KernelFunctionType,
1158 typename RangeNumberType,
1159 typename KernelNumberType,
1160 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
1161size_type
1162random_select_ref_row(
1163 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
1164 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
1165 &kernel,
1166 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
1167 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
1168 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
1169 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_row_indices,
1170 const size_type current_ref_row_index,
1171 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_row_index,
1172 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
1173 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
1174 const std::vector<
1175 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1176 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1177 const std::vector<
1178 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1179 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1180 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
1181 dim,
1182 spacedim,
1183 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1184 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1185 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1186 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1187 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1188 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1189 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1190 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1191 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1192 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1193 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1194 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1195 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
1196 dim,
1197 spacedim,
1198 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
1199 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1200{
1201 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1202 static_assert(
1203 std::is_same<
1204 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1205 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1206
1207 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), col_dof_indices.size());
1208
1213 size_type next_ref_row_selection_index;
1217 size_type next_ref_row_index(row_dof_indices.size());
1222 types::global_dof_index next_ref_row_dof_index;
1223
1224 while (!remaining_row_indices.empty())
1225 {
1226 next_ref_row_selection_index =
1227 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_row_indices) - 1);
1228 next_ref_row_index =
1229 value_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1230 next_ref_row_dof_index = row_dof_indices[next_ref_row_index];
1231
1232 if (next_ref_row_index != current_ref_row_index)
1233 {
1237 assemble_kernel_row(row_vector,
1238 kernel,
1239 kernel_factor,
1240 mass_vmult_weq,
1241 stabilization_factor,
1242 next_ref_row_dof_index,
1243 col_dof_indices,
1244 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1245 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1246 bem_values_gpu,
1247 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1248 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1249 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1250 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1251 mappings,
1252 material_id_to_mapping_index,
1253 normal_detector,
1254 scratch_data,
1255 scratch_data_gpu,
1256 copy_data);
1257
1258 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(row_vector))
1259 {
1265 erase_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1266
1267 continue;
1268 }
1269 else
1270 {
1275 return next_ref_row_index;
1276 }
1277 }
1278 else
1279 {
1280 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 1)
1281 {
1287 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1288 }
1289 else
1290 {
1295 continue;
1296 }
1297 }
1298 }
1299
1300 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1301}
1302
1303
1304template <int dim,
1305 int spacedim,
1306 template <int, typename>
1307 typename KernelFunctionType,
1308 typename RangeNumberType,
1309 typename KernelNumberType,
1310 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
1311size_type
1312random_select_ref_row(
1313 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
1314 dim,
1315 spacedim,
1316 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
1317 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
1318 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
1319 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
1320 &kernel,
1321 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
1322 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_row_indices,
1323 const size_type current_ref_row_index,
1324 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_row_index,
1325 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
1326 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
1327 const std::vector<
1328 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1329 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1330 const std::vector<
1331 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1332 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1333 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
1334 dim,
1335 spacedim,
1336 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1337 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1338 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1339 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1340 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1341 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1342 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1343 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1344 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1345 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1346 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1347 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1348 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1349{
1350 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1351 static_assert(
1352 std::is_same<
1353 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1354 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1355
1356 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), col_dof_indices.size());
1357
1362 size_type next_ref_row_selection_index;
1366 size_type next_ref_row_index(row_dof_indices.size());
1371 types::global_dof_index next_ref_row_dof_index;
1372
1373 while (!remaining_row_indices.empty())
1374 {
1375 next_ref_row_selection_index =
1376 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_row_indices) - 1);
1377 next_ref_row_index =
1378 value_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1379 next_ref_row_dof_index = row_dof_indices[next_ref_row_index];
1380
1381 if (next_ref_row_index != current_ref_row_index)
1382 {
1386 assemble_kernel_row(task_buffer,
1387 row_vector,
1388 kernel,
1389 kernel_factor,
1390 next_ref_row_dof_index,
1391 col_dof_indices,
1392 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1393 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1394 bem_values_gpu,
1395 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1396 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1397 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1398 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1399 mappings,
1400 material_id_to_mapping_index,
1401 normal_detector,
1402 scratch_data,
1403 copy_data);
1404
1405 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(row_vector))
1406 {
1412 erase_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1413
1414 continue;
1415 }
1416 else
1417 {
1422 return next_ref_row_index;
1423 }
1424 }
1425 else
1426 {
1427 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 1)
1428 {
1434 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1435 }
1436 else
1437 {
1442 continue;
1443 }
1444 }
1445 }
1446
1447 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1448}
1449
1450
1451template <int dim,
1452 int spacedim,
1453 template <int, typename>
1454 typename KernelFunctionType,
1455 typename RangeNumberType,
1456 typename KernelNumberType,
1457 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
1458size_type
1459random_select_ref_row(
1460 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
1461 dim,
1462 spacedim,
1463 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
1464 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
1465 Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
1466 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
1467 &kernel,
1468 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
1469 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
1470 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
1471 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_row_indices,
1472 const size_type current_ref_row_index,
1473 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_row_index,
1474 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
1475 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
1476 const std::vector<
1477 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1478 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1479 const std::vector<
1480 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1481 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1482 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
1483 dim,
1484 spacedim,
1485 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1486 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1487 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1488 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1489 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1490 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1491 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1492 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1493 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1494 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1495 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1496 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1497 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1498{
1499 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1500 static_assert(
1501 std::is_same<
1502 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1503 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1504
1505 AssertDimension(row_vector.size(), col_dof_indices.size());
1506
1511 size_type next_ref_row_selection_index;
1515 size_type next_ref_row_index(row_dof_indices.size());
1520 types::global_dof_index next_ref_row_dof_index;
1521
1522 while (!remaining_row_indices.empty())
1523 {
1524 next_ref_row_selection_index =
1525 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_row_indices) - 1);
1526 next_ref_row_index =
1527 value_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1528 next_ref_row_dof_index = row_dof_indices[next_ref_row_index];
1529
1530 if (next_ref_row_index != current_ref_row_index)
1531 {
1535 assemble_kernel_row(task_buffer,
1536 row_vector,
1537 kernel,
1538 kernel_factor,
1539 mass_vmult_weq,
1540 stabilization_factor,
1541 next_ref_row_dof_index,
1542 col_dof_indices,
1543 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1544 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1545 bem_values_gpu,
1546 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1547 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1548 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1549 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1550 mappings,
1551 material_id_to_mapping_index,
1552 normal_detector,
1553 scratch_data,
1554 copy_data);
1555
1556 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(row_vector))
1557 {
1563 erase_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1564
1565 continue;
1566 }
1567 else
1568 {
1573 return next_ref_row_index;
1574 }
1575 }
1576 else
1577 {
1578 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 1)
1579 {
1585 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1586 }
1587 else
1588 {
1593 continue;
1594 }
1595 }
1596 }
1597
1598 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1599}
1600
1601
1619template <typename RangeNumberType = double>
1620size_type
1621random_select_ref_row(Vector<RangeNumberType> &row_vector,
1622 const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &A,
1623 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_row_indices,
1624 const size_type current_ref_row_index,
1625 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_row_index)
1626{
1631 size_type next_ref_row_selection_index;
1635 size_type next_ref_row_index;
1636
1637 while (!remaining_row_indices.empty())
1638 {
1639 next_ref_row_selection_index =
1640 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_row_indices) - 1);
1641 next_ref_row_index =
1642 value_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1643
1644 if (next_ref_row_index != current_ref_row_index)
1645 {
1646 A.get_row(next_ref_row_index, row_vector);
1647
1648 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(row_vector))
1649 {
1655 erase_at(remaining_row_indices, next_ref_row_selection_index);
1656
1657 continue;
1658 }
1659 else
1660 {
1665 return next_ref_row_index;
1666 }
1667 }
1668 else
1669 {
1670 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 1)
1671 {
1677 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1678 }
1679 else
1680 {
1685 continue;
1686 }
1687 }
1688 }
1689
1690 return pass_the_end_ref_row_index;
1691}
1692
1693
1725template <int dim,
1726 int spacedim,
1727 template <int, typename>
1728 typename KernelFunctionType,
1729 typename RangeNumberType,
1730 typename KernelNumberType,
1731 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
1732size_type
1733random_select_ref_column(
1734 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
1735 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
1736 &kernel,
1737 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> factor,
1738 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_col_indices,
1739 const size_type current_ref_col_index,
1740 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_col_index,
1741 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
1742 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
1743 const std::vector<
1744 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1745 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1746 const std::vector<
1747 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1748 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1749 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
1750 dim,
1751 spacedim,
1752 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1753 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1754 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1755 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1756 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1757 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1758 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1759 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1760 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1761 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1762 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1763 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1764 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
1765 dim,
1766 spacedim,
1767 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
1768 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1769{
1770 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1771 static_assert(
1772 std::is_same<
1773 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1774 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1775
1776 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
1777
1782 size_type next_ref_col_selection_index;
1786 size_type next_ref_col_index(col_dof_indices.size());
1791 types::global_dof_index next_ref_col_dof_index;
1792
1793 while (!remaining_col_indices.empty())
1794 {
1795 next_ref_col_selection_index =
1796 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_col_indices) - 1);
1797 next_ref_col_index =
1798 value_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
1799 next_ref_col_dof_index = col_dof_indices[next_ref_col_index];
1800
1801 if (next_ref_col_index != current_ref_col_index)
1802 {
1806 assemble_kernel_column(col_vector,
1807 kernel,
1808 factor,
1809 row_dof_indices,
1810 next_ref_col_dof_index,
1811 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1812 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1813 bem_values_gpu,
1814 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1815 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1816 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1817 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1818 mappings,
1819 material_id_to_mapping_index,
1820 normal_detector,
1821 scratch_data,
1822 scratch_data_gpu,
1823 copy_data);
1824
1825 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(col_vector))
1826 {
1832 erase_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
1833
1834 continue;
1835 }
1836 else
1837 {
1842 return next_ref_col_index;
1843 }
1844 }
1845 else
1846 {
1847 if (size(remaining_col_indices) == 1)
1848 {
1854 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
1855 }
1856 else
1857 {
1863 continue;
1864 }
1865 }
1866 }
1867
1868 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
1869}

1871
1906template <int dim,
1907 int spacedim,
1908 template <int, typename>
1909 typename KernelFunctionType,
1910 typename RangeNumberType,
1911 typename KernelNumberType,
1912 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
1913size_type
1914random_select_ref_column(
1915 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
1916 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
1917 &kernel,
1918 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
1919 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
1920 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
1921 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_col_indices,
1922 const size_type current_ref_col_index,
1923 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_col_index,
1924 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
1925 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
1926 const std::vector<
1927 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1928 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1929 const std::vector<
1930 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
1931 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1932 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
1933 dim,
1934 spacedim,
1935 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
1936 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1937 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1938 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
1939 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
1940 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
1941 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
1942 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
1943 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
1944 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
1945 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
1946 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
1947 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
1948 dim,
1949 spacedim,
1950 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
1951 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
1952{
1953 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
1954 static_assert(
1955 std::is_same<
1956 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
1957 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
1958
1959 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
1960
1965 size_type next_ref_col_selection_index;
1969 size_type next_ref_col_index(col_dof_indices.size());
1974 types::global_dof_index next_ref_col_dof_index;
1975
1976 while (!remaining_col_indices.empty())
1977 {
1978 next_ref_col_selection_index =
1979 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_col_indices) - 1);
1980 next_ref_col_index =
1981 value_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
1982 next_ref_col_dof_index = col_dof_indices[next_ref_col_index];
1983
1984 if (next_ref_col_index != current_ref_col_index)
1985 {
1989 assemble_kernel_column(col_vector,
1990 kernel,
1991 kernel_factor,
1992 mass_vmult_weq,
1993 stabilization_factor,
1994 row_dof_indices,
1995 next_ref_col_dof_index,
1996 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
1997 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
1998 bem_values_gpu,
1999 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2000 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2001 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2002 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2003 mappings,
2004 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2005 normal_detector,
2006 scratch_data,
2007 scratch_data_gpu,
2008 copy_data);
2009
2010 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(col_vector))
2011 {
2017 erase_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2018
2019 continue;
2020 }
2021 else
2022 {
2027 return next_ref_col_index;
2028 }
2029 }
2030 else
2031 {
2032 if (size(remaining_col_indices) == 1)
2033 {
2039 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2040 }
2041 else
2042 {
2048 continue;
2049 }
2050 }
2051 }
2052
2053 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2054}

2057template <int dim,
2058 int spacedim,
2059 template <int, typename>
2060 typename KernelFunctionType,
2061 typename RangeNumberType,
2062 typename KernelNumberType,
2063 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
2064size_type
2065random_select_ref_column(
2066 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
2067 dim,
2068 spacedim,
2069 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
2070 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
2071 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
2072 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
2073 &kernel,
2074 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> factor,
2075 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_col_indices,
2076 const size_type current_ref_col_index,
2077 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_col_index,
2078 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
2079 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
2080 const std::vector<
2081 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
2082 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
2083 const std::vector<
2084 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
2085 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
2086 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
2087 dim,
2088 spacedim,
2089 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
2090 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2091 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2092 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2093 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2094 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2095 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2096 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
2097 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
2098 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
2099 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
2100 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
2101 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
2102{
2103 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
2104 static_assert(
2105 std::is_same<
2106 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
2107 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
2108
2109 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
2110
2115 size_type next_ref_col_selection_index;
2119 size_type next_ref_col_index(col_dof_indices.size());
2124 types::global_dof_index next_ref_col_dof_index;
2125
2126 while (!remaining_col_indices.empty())
2127 {
2128 next_ref_col_selection_index =
2129 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_col_indices) - 1);
2130 next_ref_col_index =
2131 value_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2132 next_ref_col_dof_index = col_dof_indices[next_ref_col_index];
2133
2134 if (next_ref_col_index != current_ref_col_index)
2135 {
2139 assemble_kernel_column(task_buffer,
2140 col_vector,
2141 kernel,
2142 factor,
2143 row_dof_indices,
2144 next_ref_col_dof_index,
2145 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
2146 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
2147 bem_values_gpu,
2148 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2149 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2150 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2151 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2152 mappings,
2153 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2154 normal_detector,
2155 scratch_data,
2156 copy_data);
2157
2158 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(col_vector))
2159 {
2165 erase_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2166
2167 continue;
2168 }
2169 else
2170 {
2175 return next_ref_col_index;
2176 }
2177 }
2178 else
2179 {
2180 if (size(remaining_col_indices) == 1)
2181 {
2187 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2188 }
2189 else
2190 {
2196 continue;
2197 }
2198 }
2199 }
2200
2201 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2202}

2205template <int dim,
2206 int spacedim,
2207 template <int, typename>
2208 typename KernelFunctionType,
2209 typename RangeNumberType,
2210 typename KernelNumberType,
2211 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
2212size_type
2213random_select_ref_column(
2214 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
2215 dim,
2216 spacedim,
2217 DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>,
2218 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &task_buffer,
2219 Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
2220 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
2221 &kernel,
2222 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
2223 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
2224 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
2225 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_col_indices,
2226 const size_type current_ref_col_index,
2227 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_col_index,
2228 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &row_dof_indices,
2229 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &col_dof_indices,
2230 const std::vector<
2231 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
2232 &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
2233 const std::vector<
2234 std::vector<const typename DoFHandler<dim, spacedim>::cell_iterator *>>
2235 &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
2236 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
2237 dim,
2238 spacedim,
2239 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
2240 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2241 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2242 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2243 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2244 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2245 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2246 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
2247 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
2248 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
2249 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
2250 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
2251 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
2252{
2253 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
2254 static_assert(
2255 std::is_same<
2256 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type,
2257 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
2258
2259 AssertDimension(col_vector.size(), row_dof_indices.size());
2260
2265 size_type next_ref_col_selection_index;
2269 size_type next_ref_col_index(col_dof_indices.size());
2274 types::global_dof_index next_ref_col_dof_index;
2275
2276 while (!remaining_col_indices.empty())
2277 {
2278 next_ref_col_selection_index =
2279 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_col_indices) - 1);
2280 next_ref_col_index =
2281 value_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2282 next_ref_col_dof_index = col_dof_indices[next_ref_col_index];
2283
2284 if (next_ref_col_index != current_ref_col_index)
2285 {
2289 assemble_kernel_column(task_buffer,
2290 col_vector,
2291 kernel,
2292 kernel_factor,
2293 mass_vmult_weq,
2294 stabilization_factor,
2295 row_dof_indices,
2296 next_ref_col_dof_index,
2297 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
2298 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
2299 bem_values_gpu,
2300 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2301 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2302 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2303 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2304 mappings,
2305 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2306 normal_detector,
2307 scratch_data,
2308 copy_data);
2309
2310 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(col_vector))
2311 {
2317 erase_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2318
2319 continue;
2320 }
2321 else
2322 {
2327 return next_ref_col_index;
2328 }
2329 }
2330 else
2331 {
2332 if (size(remaining_col_indices) == 1)
2333 {
2339 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2340 }
2341 else
2342 {
2348 continue;
2349 }
2350 }
2351 }
2352
2353 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2354}
2355
2356
2373template <typename RangeNumberType = double>
2374size_type
2375random_select_ref_column(Vector<RangeNumberType> &col_vector,
2376 const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &A,
2377 std::forward_list<size_type> &remaining_col_indices,
2378 const size_type current_ref_col_index,
2379 const size_type pass_the_end_ref_col_index)
2380{
2385 size_type next_ref_col_selection_index;
2389 size_type next_ref_col_index;
2390
2391 while (!remaining_col_indices.empty())
2392 {
2393 next_ref_col_selection_index =
2394 generate_random_index(0, size(remaining_col_indices) - 1);
2395 next_ref_col_index =
2396 value_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2397
2398 if (next_ref_col_index != current_ref_col_index)
2399 {
2400 A.get_column(next_ref_col_index, col_vector);
2401
2402 if (LinAlg::is_all_zero(col_vector))
2403 {
2409 erase_at(remaining_col_indices, next_ref_col_selection_index);
2410 }
2411 else
2412 {
2417 return next_ref_col_index;
2418 }
2419 }
2420 else
2421 {
2422 if (size(remaining_col_indices) == 1)
2423 {
2429 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2430 }
2431 else
2432 {
2438 continue;
2439 }
2440 }
2441 }
2442
2443 return pass_the_end_ref_col_index;
2444}
2445
2446
2447
2475template <int dim,
2476 int spacedim,
2477 template <int, typename>
2478 typename KernelFunctionType,
2479 typename RangeNumberType,
2480 typename KernelNumberType,
2481 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
2482void
2483aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
2484 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> &rkmat,
2485 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
2486 &aca_config,
2487 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
2488 &kernel,
2489 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
2490 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &row_dof_index_range,
2491 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &col_dof_index_range,
2492 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
2493 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
2494 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
2495 dim,
2496 spacedim,
2497 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
2498 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2499 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2500 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
2501 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2502 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2503 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2504 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
2505 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
2506 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
2507 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
2508 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
2509 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
2510 dim,
2511 spacedim,
2512 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
2513 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
2514{
2515 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
2516 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
2517 static_assert(
2518 std::is_same<
2519 real_type,
2520 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
2521
2525 const size_type m = row_dof_index_range[1] - row_dof_index_range[0];
2526 const size_type n = col_dof_index_range[1] - col_dof_index_range[0];
2527
2528 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_m(), m);
2529 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_n(), n);
2530
2535 const unsigned int effective_max_iter =
2536 (aca_config.max_iter > std::min(m, n)) ? std::min(m, n) :
2537 aca_config.max_iter;
2538
2543 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> row_dof_indices(m);
2544 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> col_dof_indices(n);
2545 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
2546 row_dof_indices, row_dof_index_range[0]);
2547 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
2548 col_dof_indices, col_dof_index_range[0]);
2549
2556 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_formal_rank(), effective_max_iter);
2557 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &u_mat = rkmat.get_A();
2558 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &v_mat = rkmat.get_B();
2559 u_mat = RangeNumberType();
2560 v_mat = RangeNumberType();
2561
2566 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_row_indices(m);
2567 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_col_indices(n);
2568
2569 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_row_indices);
2570 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_col_indices);
2571
2576 Vector<RangeNumberType> vr(n);
2577 Vector<RangeNumberType> uc(m);
2578
2579 size_type r = random_select_ref_row(vr,
2580 kernel,
2581 kernel_factor,
2582 remaining_row_indices,
2583 m,
2584 m,
2585 row_dof_indices,
2586 col_dof_indices,
2587 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2588 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2589 bem_values_gpu,
2590 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2591 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2592 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2593 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2594 mappings,
2595 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2596 normal_detector,
2597 scratch_data,
2598 scratch_data_gpu,
2599 copy_data);
2600
2601 if (r == m)
2602 {
2603 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the current matrix
2604 // block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
2605 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
2606 return;
2607 }
2608
2609 size_type c = random_select_ref_column(uc,
2610 kernel,
2611 kernel_factor,
2612 remaining_col_indices,
2613 n,
2614 n,
2615 row_dof_indices,
2616 col_dof_indices,
2617 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2618 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2619 bem_values_gpu,
2620 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2621 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2622 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2623 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2624 mappings,
2625 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2626 normal_detector,
2627 scratch_data,
2628 scratch_data_gpu,
2629 copy_data);
2630
2631 if (c == n)
2632 {
2633 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the current
2634 // matrix block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
2635 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
2636 return;
2637 }
2638
2642 Vector<real_type> vr_abs(n);
2643 Vector<real_type> uc_abs(m);
2644
2652 std::transform(vr.begin(),
2653 vr.end(),
2654 vr_abs.begin(),
2655 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
2656 std::transform(uc.begin(),
2657 uc.end(),
2658 uc_abs.begin(),
2659 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
2660
2665 size_type ik, jk;
2666
2670 Vector<RangeNumberType> vk(n);
2671 Vector<RangeNumberType> uk(m);
2672
2677 Vector<real_type> vk_abs(n);
2678 Vector<real_type> uk_abs(m);
2679
2683 Vector<RangeNumberType> vl(n);
2684 Vector<RangeNumberType> ul(m);
2685
2689 real_type error_threshold = 0.;
2690
2694 for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= effective_max_iter; k++)
2695 {
2699 // N.B. The function @p std::max_element return the iterator pointing
2700 // to the maximum element in the list.
2701 size_type i_star =
2702 std::distance(uc_abs.begin(),
2703 std::max_element(uc_abs.begin(), uc_abs.end()));
2704
2708 size_type j_star =
2709 std::distance(vr_abs.begin(),
2710 std::max_element(vr_abs.begin(), vr_abs.end()));
2711
2712 if (uc_abs(i_star) > vr_abs(j_star))
2713 {
2717 ik = i_star;
2718
2722 assemble_kernel_row(vk,
2723 kernel,
2724 kernel_factor,
2725 row_dof_indices[ik],
2726 col_dof_indices,
2727 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2728 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2729 bem_values_gpu,
2730 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2731 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2732 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2733 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2734 mappings,
2735 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2736 normal_detector,
2737 scratch_data,
2738 scratch_data_gpu,
2739 copy_data);
2740
2749 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
2750 {
2754 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
2755 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
2756
2757 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
2758 }
2759
2764 std::transform(vk.begin(),
2765 vk.end(),
2766 vk_abs.begin(),
2767 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
2768 jk = std::distance(vk_abs.begin(),
2769 std::max_element(vk_abs.begin(), vk_abs.end()));
2770
2774 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
2775 vk /= value_at_cross;
2776
2780 assemble_kernel_column(uk,
2781 kernel,
2782 kernel_factor,
2783 row_dof_indices,
2784 col_dof_indices[jk],
2785 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2786 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2787 bem_values_gpu,
2788 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2789 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2790 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2791 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2792 mappings,
2793 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2794 normal_detector,
2795 scratch_data,
2796 scratch_data_gpu,
2797 copy_data);
2798
2799 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
2800 {
2804 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
2805 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
2806
2807 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
2808 }
2809 }
2810 else
2811 {
2815 jk = j_star;
2816
2820 assemble_kernel_column(uk,
2821 kernel,
2822 kernel_factor,
2823 row_dof_indices,
2824 col_dof_indices[jk],
2825 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2826 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2827 bem_values_gpu,
2828 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2829 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2830 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2831 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2832 mappings,
2833 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2834 normal_detector,
2835 scratch_data,
2836 scratch_data_gpu,
2837 copy_data);
2838
2839 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
2840 {
2844 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
2845 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
2846
2847 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
2848 }
2849
2854 std::transform(uk.begin(),
2855 uk.end(),
2856 uk_abs.begin(),
2857 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
2858 ik = std::distance(uk_abs.begin(),
2859 std::max_element(uk_abs.begin(), uk_abs.end()));
2860
2864 assemble_kernel_row(vk,
2865 kernel,
2866 kernel_factor,
2867 row_dof_indices[ik],
2868 col_dof_indices,
2869 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2870 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2871 bem_values_gpu,
2872 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2873 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2874 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2875 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2876 mappings,
2877 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2878 normal_detector,
2879 scratch_data,
2880 scratch_data_gpu,
2881 copy_data);
2882
2883 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
2884 {
2888 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
2889 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
2890
2891 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
2892 }
2893
2897 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
2898 vk /= value_at_cross;
2899 }
2900
2905 u_mat.fill_col(k - 1, uk, false);
2906 v_mat.fill_col(k - 1, vk, false);
2907
2908 if (k == 1)
2909 {
2913 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * rkmat.frobenius_norm(1);
2914 }
2915
2916 remaining_row_indices.remove(ik);
2917 remaining_col_indices.remove(jk);
2918
2919 if (ik == r)
2920 {
2925 r = random_select_ref_row(vr,
2926 kernel,
2927 kernel_factor,
2928 remaining_row_indices,
2929 r,
2930 m,
2931 row_dof_indices,
2932 col_dof_indices,
2933 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2934 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
2935 bem_values_gpu,
2936 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2937 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
2938 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
2939 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
2940 mappings,
2941 material_id_to_mapping_index,
2942 normal_detector,
2943 scratch_data,
2944 scratch_data_gpu,
2945 copy_data);
2946
2947 if (r == m)
2948 {
2949 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the ACA+
2950 // iteration should stop here.
2951 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
2952 {
2959 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
2960 }
2961
2967 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
2968 v_mat.conjugate();
2969
2970 return;
2971 }
2972 else
2973 {
2974 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
2975 {
2979 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
2980 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
2981
2982 vr.add(-ul(r), vl);
2983 }
2984 }
2985 }
2986 else
2987 {
2991 vr.add(-uk(r), vk);
2992 }
2993
2997 std::transform(vr.begin(),
2998 vr.end(),
2999 vr_abs.begin(),
3000 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3001
3002 if (jk == c)
3003 {
3008 c = random_select_ref_column(uc,
3009 kernel,
3010 kernel_factor,
3011 remaining_col_indices,
3012 c,
3013 n,
3014 row_dof_indices,
3015 col_dof_indices,
3016 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3017 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3018 bem_values_gpu,
3019 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3020 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3021 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3022 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3023 mappings,
3024 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3025 normal_detector,
3026 scratch_data,
3027 scratch_data_gpu,
3028 copy_data);
3029
3030 if (c == n)
3031 {
3032 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the ACA+
3033 // iteration should stop here.
3034 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3035 {
3042 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3043 }
3044
3050 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3051 v_mat.conjugate();
3052
3053 return;
3054 }
3055 else
3056 {
3057 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
3058 {
3062 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3063 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3064
3065 uc.add(-vl(c), ul);
3066 }
3067 }
3068 }
3069 else
3070 {
3074 uc.add(-vk(c), uk);
3075 }
3076
3080 std::transform(uc.begin(),
3081 uc.end(),
3082 uc_abs.begin(),
3083 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3084
3088 if ((k > 1) && (uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() <= error_threshold))
3089 {
3090 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3091 {
3097 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3098 }
3099
3105 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3106 v_mat.conjugate();
3107
3108 return;
3109 }
3110 else
3111 {
3112 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 0)
3113 {
3114 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3115 {
3122 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3123 }
3124
3130 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3131 v_mat.conjugate();
3132
3133 return;
3134 }
3135 }
3136 }
3137
3143 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3144 v_mat.conjugate();
3145
3146 std::cerr
3147 << "Maximum H-matrix rank has been reached and the approximation accuracy has not been achieved, exit early!"
3148 << std::endl;
3149}
3150
3151
3183template <int dim,
3184 int spacedim,
3185 template <int, typename>
3186 typename KernelFunctionType,
3187 typename RangeNumberType,
3188 typename KernelNumberType,
3189 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
3190void
3191aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
3192 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> &rkmat,
3193 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
3194 &aca_config,
3195 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, KernelNumberType> &kernel,
3196 const KernelNumberType kernel_factor,
3197 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
3198 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
3199 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &row_dof_index_range,
3200 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &col_dof_index_range,
3201 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
3202 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
3203 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
3204 dim,
3205 spacedim,
3206 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
3207 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
3208 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3209 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
3210 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3211 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3212 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3213 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
3214 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
3215 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
3216 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
3217 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
3218 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
3219 CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType>
3220 &scratch_data_gpu,
3221 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
3222{
3223 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
3224 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
3225 static_assert(
3226 std::is_same<
3227 real_type,
3228 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
3229
3233 const size_type m = row_dof_index_range[1] - row_dof_index_range[0];
3234 const size_type n = col_dof_index_range[1] - col_dof_index_range[0];
3235
3236 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_m(), m);
3237 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_n(), n);
3238
3243 const unsigned int effective_max_iter =
3244 (aca_config.max_iter > std::min(m, n)) ? std::min(m, n) :
3245 aca_config.max_iter;
3246
3251 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> row_dof_indices(m);
3252 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> col_dof_indices(n);
3253 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
3254 row_dof_indices, row_dof_index_range[0]);
3255 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
3256 col_dof_indices, col_dof_index_range[0]);
3257
3264 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_formal_rank(), effective_max_iter);
3265 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &u_mat = rkmat.get_A();
3266 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &v_mat = rkmat.get_B();
3267 u_mat = RangeNumberType();
3268 v_mat = RangeNumberType();
3269
3274 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_row_indices(m);
3275 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_col_indices(n);
3276
3277 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_row_indices);
3278 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_col_indices);
3279
3284 Vector<RangeNumberType> vr(n);
3285 Vector<RangeNumberType> uc(m);
3286
3287 size_type r = random_select_ref_row(vr,
3288 kernel,
3289 kernel_factor,
3290 mass_vmult_weq,
3291 stabilization_factor,
3292 remaining_row_indices,
3293 m,
3294 m,
3295 row_dof_indices,
3296 col_dof_indices,
3297 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3298 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3299 bem_values_gpu,
3300 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3301 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3302 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3303 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3304 mappings,
3305 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3306 normal_detector,
3307 scratch_data,
3308 scratch_data_gpu,
3309 copy_data);
3310
3311 if (r == m)
3312 {
3313 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the current matrix
3314 // block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
3315 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
3316 return;
3317 }
3318
3319 size_type c = random_select_ref_column(uc,
3320 kernel,
3321 kernel_factor,
3322 mass_vmult_weq,
3323 stabilization_factor,
3324 remaining_col_indices,
3325 n,
3326 n,
3327 row_dof_indices,
3328 col_dof_indices,
3329 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3330 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3331 bem_values_gpu,
3332 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3333 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3334 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3335 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3336 mappings,
3337 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3338 normal_detector,
3339 scratch_data,
3340 scratch_data_gpu,
3341 copy_data);
3342
3343 if (c == n)
3344 {
3345 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the current
3346 // matrix block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
3347 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
3348 return;
3349 }
3350
3354 Vector<real_type> vr_abs(n);
3355 Vector<real_type> uc_abs(m);
3356
3364 std::transform(vr.begin(),
3365 vr.end(),
3366 vr_abs.begin(),
3367 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3368 std::transform(uc.begin(),
3369 uc.end(),
3370 uc_abs.begin(),
3371 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3372
3377 size_type ik, jk;
3378
3382 Vector<RangeNumberType> vk(n);
3383 Vector<RangeNumberType> uk(m);
3384
3389 Vector<real_type> vk_abs(n);
3390 Vector<real_type> uk_abs(m);
3391
3395 Vector<RangeNumberType> vl(n);
3396 Vector<RangeNumberType> ul(m);
3397
3401 real_type error_threshold = 0.;
3402
3406 for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= effective_max_iter; k++)
3407 {
3411 // N.B. The function @p std::max_element return the iterator pointing
3412 // to the maximum element in the list.
3413 size_type i_star =
3414 std::distance(uc_abs.begin(),
3415 std::max_element(uc_abs.begin(), uc_abs.end()));
3416
3420 size_type j_star =
3421 std::distance(vr_abs.begin(),
3422 std::max_element(vr_abs.begin(), vr_abs.end()));
3423
3424 if (uc_abs(i_star) > vr_abs(j_star))
3425 {
3429 ik = i_star;
3430
3434 assemble_kernel_row(vk,
3435 kernel,
3436 kernel_factor,
3437 mass_vmult_weq,
3438 stabilization_factor,
3439 row_dof_indices[ik],
3440 col_dof_indices,
3441 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3442 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3443 bem_values_gpu,
3444 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3445 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3446 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3447 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3448 mappings,
3449 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3450 normal_detector,
3451 scratch_data,
3452 scratch_data_gpu,
3453 copy_data);
3454
3463 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
3464 {
3468 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3469 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3470
3471 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
3472 }
3473
3478 std::transform(vk.begin(),
3479 vk.end(),
3480 vk_abs.begin(),
3481 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3482 jk = std::distance(vk_abs.begin(),
3483 std::max_element(vk_abs.begin(), vk_abs.end()));
3484
3488 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
3489 vk /= value_at_cross;
3490
3494 assemble_kernel_column(uk,
3495 kernel,
3496 kernel_factor,
3497 mass_vmult_weq,
3498 stabilization_factor,
3499 row_dof_indices,
3500 col_dof_indices[jk],
3501 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3502 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3503 bem_values_gpu,
3504 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3505 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3506 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3507 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3508 mappings,
3509 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3510 normal_detector,
3511 scratch_data,
3512 scratch_data_gpu,
3513 copy_data);
3514
3515 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
3516 {
3520 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3521 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3522
3523 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
3524 }
3525 }
3526 else
3527 {
3531 jk = j_star;
3532
3536 assemble_kernel_column(uk,
3537 kernel,
3538 kernel_factor,
3539 mass_vmult_weq,
3540 stabilization_factor,
3541 row_dof_indices,
3542 col_dof_indices[jk],
3543 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3544 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3545 bem_values_gpu,
3546 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
