3547 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3548 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3549 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3550 mappings,
3551 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3552 normal_detector,
3553 scratch_data,
3554 scratch_data_gpu,
3555 copy_data);
3556
3557 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
3558 {
3562 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3563 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3564
3565 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
3566 }
3567
3572 std::transform(uk.begin(),
3573 uk.end(),
3574 uk_abs.begin(),
3575 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3576 ik = std::distance(uk_abs.begin(),
3577 std::max_element(uk_abs.begin(), uk_abs.end()));
3578
3582 assemble_kernel_row(vk,
3583 kernel,
3584 kernel_factor,
3585 mass_vmult_weq,
3586 stabilization_factor,
3587 row_dof_indices[ik],
3588 col_dof_indices,
3589 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3590 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3591 bem_values_gpu,
3592 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3593 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3594 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3595 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3596 mappings,
3597 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3598 normal_detector,
3599 scratch_data,
3600 scratch_data_gpu,
3601 copy_data);
3602
3603 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
3604 {
3608 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3609 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3610
3611 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
3612 }
3613
3617 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
3618 vk /= value_at_cross;
3619 }
3620
3625 u_mat.fill_col(k - 1, uk, false);
3626 v_mat.fill_col(k - 1, vk, false);
3627
3628 if (k == 1)
3629 {
3633 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * rkmat.frobenius_norm(1);
3634 }
3635
3636 remaining_row_indices.remove(ik);
3637 remaining_col_indices.remove(jk);
3638
3639 if (ik == r)
3640 {
3645 r = random_select_ref_row(vr,
3646 kernel,
3647 kernel_factor,
3648 mass_vmult_weq,
3649 stabilization_factor,
3650 remaining_row_indices,
3651 r,
3652 m,
3653 row_dof_indices,
3654 col_dof_indices,
3655 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3656 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3657 bem_values_gpu,
3658 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3659 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3660 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3661 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3662 mappings,
3663 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3664 normal_detector,
3665 scratch_data,
3666 scratch_data_gpu,
3667 copy_data);
3668
3669 if (r == m)
3670 {
3671 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the ACA+
3672 // iteration should stop here.
3673 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3674 {
3681 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3682 }
3683
3689 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3690 v_mat.conjugate();
3691
3692 return;
3693 }
3694 else
3695 {
3696 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
3697 {
3701 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3702 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3703
3704 vr.add(-ul(r), vl);
3705 }
3706 }
3707 }
3708 else
3709 {
3713 vr.add(-uk(r), vk);
3714 }
3715
3719 std::transform(vr.begin(),
3720 vr.end(),
3721 vr_abs.begin(),
3722 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3723
3724 if (jk == c)
3725 {
3730 c = random_select_ref_column(uc,
3731 kernel,
3732 kernel_factor,
3733 mass_vmult_weq,
3734 stabilization_factor,
3735 remaining_col_indices,
3736 c,
3737 n,
3738 row_dof_indices,
3739 col_dof_indices,
3740 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3741 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
3742 bem_values_gpu,
3743 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3744 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3745 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3746 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3747 mappings,
3748 material_id_to_mapping_index,
3749 normal_detector,
3750 scratch_data,
3751 scratch_data_gpu,
3752 copy_data);
3753
3754 if (c == n)
3755 {
3756 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the ACA+
3757 // iteration should stop here.
3758 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3759 {
3766 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3767 }
3768
3774 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3775 v_mat.conjugate();
3776
3777 return;
3778 }
3779 else
3780 {
3781 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
3782 {
3786 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
3787 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
3788
3789 uc.add(-vl(c), ul);
3790 }
3791 }
3792 }
3793 else
3794 {
3798 uc.add(-vk(c), uk);
3799 }
3800
3804 std::transform(uc.begin(),
3805 uc.end(),
3806 uc_abs.begin(),
3807 static_cast<real_type (*)(RangeNumberType)>(std::abs));
3808
3812 if ((k > 1) && (uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() <= error_threshold))
3813 {
3814 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3815 {
3821 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3822 }
3823
3829 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3830 v_mat.conjugate();
3831
3832 return;
3833 }
3834 else
3835 {
3836 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 0)
3837 {
3838 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
3839 {
3846 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
3847 }
3848
3854 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3855 v_mat.conjugate();
3856
3857 return;
3858 }
3859 }
3860 }
3861
3867 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
3868 v_mat.conjugate();
3869
3870 std::cerr
3871 << "Maximum H-matrix rank has been reached and the approximation accuracy has not been achieved, exit early!"
3872 << std::endl;
3873}
3874
3875
3882template <int dim,
3883 int spacedim,
3884 template <int, typename>
3885 typename KernelFunctionType,
3886 typename RangeNumberType,
3887 typename KernelNumberType,
3888 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
3889void
3890aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
3891 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> &rkmat,
3892 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
3893 &aca_config,
3894 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
3895 &kernel,
3896 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
3897 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &row_dof_index_range,
3898 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &col_dof_index_range,
3899 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
3900 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
3901 const BEMValues<dim,
3902 spacedim,
3903 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
3904 &bem_values,
3905 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
3906 dim,
3907 spacedim,
3908 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
3909 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
3910 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3911 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
3912 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
3913 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
3914 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
3915 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
3916 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
3917 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
3918 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
3919 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
3920 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
3921{
3922 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
3923 using CUDARangeNumberType = DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>;
3924 using CUDAKernelNumberType = DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>;
3925 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
3926 static_assert(
3927 std::is_same<
3928 real_type,
3929 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
3930
3934 const size_type m = row_dof_index_range[1] - row_dof_index_range[0];
3935 const size_type n = col_dof_index_range[1] - col_dof_index_range[0];
3936
3937 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_m(), m);
3938 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_n(), n);
3939
3944 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
3945 dim,
3946 spacedim,
3947 CUDARangeNumberType,
3948 CUDAKernelNumberType>
3949 sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector(n,
3950 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
3951 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
3952 bem_values,
3953 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
3954 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
3955 dim,
3956 spacedim,
3957 CUDARangeNumberType,
3958 CUDAKernelNumberType>
3959 sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector(m,
3960 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
3961 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
3962 bem_values,
3963 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
3964
3969 const unsigned int effective_max_iter =
3970 (aca_config.max_iter > std::min(m, n)) ? std::min(m, n) :
3971 aca_config.max_iter;
3972
3977 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> row_dof_indices(m);
3978 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> col_dof_indices(n);
3979 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
3980 row_dof_indices, row_dof_index_range[0]);
3981 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
3982 col_dof_indices, col_dof_index_range[0]);
3983
3990 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_formal_rank(), effective_max_iter);
3991 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &u_mat = rkmat.get_A();
3992 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &v_mat = rkmat.get_B();
3993 u_mat = RangeNumberType();
3994 v_mat = RangeNumberType();
3995
4000 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_row_indices(m);
4001 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_col_indices(n);
4002
4003 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_row_indices);
4004 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_col_indices);
4005
4010 Vector<RangeNumberType> vr(n);
4011 Vector<RangeNumberType> uc(m);
4012
4013 AssertCuda(
4014 cudaHostRegister((void *)(vr.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * n, 0));
4015 AssertCuda(
4016 cudaHostRegister((void *)(uc.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * m, 0));
4017
4018 size_type r = random_select_ref_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4019 vr,
4020 kernel,
4021 kernel_factor,
4022 remaining_row_indices,
4023 m,
4024 m,
4025 row_dof_indices,
4026 col_dof_indices,
4027 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4028 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4029 bem_values_gpu,
4030 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4031 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4032 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4033 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4034 mappings,
4035 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4036 normal_detector,
4037 scratch_data,
4038 copy_data);
4039
4040 if (r == m)
4041 {
4042 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the current matrix
4043 // block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
4044 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
4045
4046 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4047 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4048
4049 return;
4050 }
4051
4052 size_type c = random_select_ref_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
4053 uc,
4054 kernel,
4055 kernel_factor,
4056 remaining_col_indices,
4057 n,
4058 n,
4059 row_dof_indices,
4060 col_dof_indices,
4061 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4062 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4063 bem_values_gpu,
4064 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4065 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4066 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4067 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4068 mappings,
4069 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4070 normal_detector,
4071 scratch_data,
4072 copy_data);
4073
4074 if (c == n)
4075 {
4076 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the current
4077 // matrix block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
4078 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
4079
4080 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4081 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4082
4083 return;
4084 }
4085
4089 Vector<real_type> vr_abs(n);
4090 Vector<real_type> uc_abs(m);
4091
4099 std::transform(vr.begin(),
4100 vr.end(),
4101 vr_abs.begin(),
4102 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4103 return std::abs(val);
4104 });
4105 std::transform(uc.begin(),
4106 uc.end(),
4107 uc_abs.begin(),
4108 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4109 return std::abs(val);
4110 });
4111
4116 size_type ik, jk;
4117
4121 Vector<RangeNumberType> vk(n);
4122 Vector<RangeNumberType> uk(m);
4123
4124 AssertCuda(
4125 cudaHostRegister((void *)(vk.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * n, 0));
4126 AssertCuda(
4127 cudaHostRegister((void *)(uk.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * m, 0));
4128
4133 Vector<real_type> vk_abs(n);
4134 Vector<real_type> uk_abs(m);
4135
4139 Vector<RangeNumberType> vl(n);
4140 Vector<RangeNumberType> ul(m);
4141
4145 real_type error_threshold = 0.;
4146
4150 for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= effective_max_iter; k++)
4151 {
4155 // N.B. The function @p std::max_element return the iterator pointing
4156 // to the maximum element in the list.
4157 size_type i_star =
4158 std::distance(uc_abs.begin(),
4159 std::max_element(uc_abs.begin(), uc_abs.end()));
4160
4164 size_type j_star =
4165 std::distance(vr_abs.begin(),
4166 std::max_element(vr_abs.begin(), vr_abs.end()));
4167
4168 if (uc_abs(i_star) > vr_abs(j_star))
4169 {
4173 ik = i_star;
4174
4178 assemble_kernel_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4179 vk,
4180 kernel,
4181 kernel_factor,
4182 row_dof_indices[ik],
4183 col_dof_indices,
4184 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4185 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4186 bem_values_gpu,
4187 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4188 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4189 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4190 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4191 mappings,
4192 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4193 normal_detector,
4194 scratch_data,
4195 copy_data);
4196
4205 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
4206 {
4210 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4211 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4212
4213 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
4214 }
4215
4220 std::transform(vk.begin(),
4221 vk.end(),
4222 vk_abs.begin(),
4223 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4224 return std::abs(val);
4225 });
4226 jk = std::distance(vk_abs.begin(),
4227 std::max_element(vk_abs.begin(), vk_abs.end()));
4228
4232 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
4233 vk /= value_at_cross;
4234
4238 assemble_kernel_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
4239 uk,
4240 kernel,
4241 kernel_factor,
4242 row_dof_indices,
4243 col_dof_indices[jk],
4244 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4245 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4246 bem_values_gpu,
4247 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4248 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4249 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4250 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4251 mappings,
4252 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4253 normal_detector,
4254 scratch_data,
4255 copy_data);
4256
4257 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
4258 {
4262 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4263 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4264
4265 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
4266 }
4267 }
4268 else
4269 {
4273 jk = j_star;
4274
4278 assemble_kernel_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
4279 uk,
4280 kernel,
4281 kernel_factor,
4282 row_dof_indices,
4283 col_dof_indices[jk],
4284 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4285 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4286 bem_values_gpu,
4287 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4288 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4289 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4290 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4291 mappings,
4292 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4293 normal_detector,
4294 scratch_data,
4295 copy_data);
4296
4297 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
4298 {
4302 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4303 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4304
4305 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
4306 }
4307
4312 std::transform(uk.begin(),
4313 uk.end(),
4314 uk_abs.begin(),
4315 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4316 return std::abs(val);
4317 });
4318 ik = std::distance(uk_abs.begin(),
4319 std::max_element(uk_abs.begin(), uk_abs.end()));
4320
4324 assemble_kernel_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4325 vk,
4326 kernel,
4327 kernel_factor,
4328 row_dof_indices[ik],
4329 col_dof_indices,
4330 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4331 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4332 bem_values_gpu,
4333 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4334 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4335 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4336 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4337 mappings,
4338 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4339 normal_detector,
4340 scratch_data,
4341 copy_data);
4342
4343 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
4344 {
4348 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4349 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4350
4351 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
4352 }
4353
4357 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
4358 vk /= value_at_cross;
4359 }
4360
4365 u_mat.fill_col(k - 1, uk, false);
4366 v_mat.fill_col(k - 1, vk, false);
4367
4368 if (k == 1)
4369 {
4373 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * rkmat.frobenius_norm(1);
4374 }
4375
4376 remaining_row_indices.remove(ik);
4377 remaining_col_indices.remove(jk);
4378
4379 if (ik == r)
4380 {
4385 r = random_select_ref_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4386 vr,
4387 kernel,
4388 kernel_factor,
4389 remaining_row_indices,
4390 r,
4391 m,
4392 row_dof_indices,
4393 col_dof_indices,
4394 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4395 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4396 bem_values_gpu,
4397 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4398 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4399 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4400 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4401 mappings,
4402 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4403 normal_detector,
4404 scratch_data,
4405 copy_data);
4406
4407 if (r == m)
4408 {
4409 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the ACA+
4410 // iteration should stop here.
4411 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
4412 {
4419 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
4420 }
4421
4422 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4423 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4424 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
4425 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
4426
4432 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
4433 v_mat.conjugate();
4434
4435 return;
4436 }
4437 else
4438 {
4439 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
4440 {
4444 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4445 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4446
4447 vr.add(-ul(r), vl);
4448 }
4449 }
4450 }
4451 else
4452 {
4456 vr.add(-uk(r), vk);
4457 }
4458
4462 std::transform(vr.begin(),
4463 vr.end(),
4464 vr_abs.begin(),
4465 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4466 return std::abs(val);
4467 });
4468
4469 if (jk == c)
4470 {
4475 c = random_select_ref_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
4476 uc,
4477 kernel,
4478 kernel_factor,
4479 remaining_col_indices,
4480 c,
4481 n,
4482 row_dof_indices,
4483 col_dof_indices,
4484 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4485 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4486 bem_values_gpu,
4487 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4488 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4489 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4490 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4491 mappings,
4492 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4493 normal_detector,
4494 scratch_data,
4495 copy_data);
4496
4497 if (c == n)
4498 {
4499 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the ACA+
4500 // iteration should stop here.
4501 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
4502 {
4509 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
4510 }
4511
4512 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4513 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4514 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
4515 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
4516
4522 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
4523 v_mat.conjugate();
4524
4525 return;
4526 }
4527 else
4528 {
4529 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
4530 {
4534 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4535 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4536
4537 uc.add(-vl(c), ul);
4538 }
4539 }
4540 }
4541 else
4542 {
4546 uc.add(-vk(c), uk);
4547 }
4548
4552 std::transform(uc.begin(),
4553 uc.end(),
4554 uc_abs.begin(),
4555 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4556 return std::abs(val);
4557 });
4558
4562 if ((k > 1) && (uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() <= error_threshold))
4563 {
4564 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
4565 {
4571 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
4572 }
4573
4574 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4575 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4576 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
4577 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
4578
4584 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
4585 v_mat.conjugate();
4586
4587 return;
4588 }
4589 else
4590 {
4591 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 0)
4592 {
4593 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
4594 {
4601 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
4602 }
4603
4604 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4605 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4606 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
4607 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
4608
4614 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
4615 v_mat.conjugate();
4616
4617 return;
4618 }
4619 }
4620 }
4621
4622 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4623 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4624 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
4625 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
4626
4632 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
4633 v_mat.conjugate();
4634
4635 std::cerr
4636 << "Maximum H-matrix rank has been reached and the approximation accuracy has not been achieved, exit early!"
4637 << std::endl;
4638}
4639
4640
4641template <int dim,
4642 int spacedim,
4643 template <int, typename>
4644 typename KernelFunctionType,
4645 typename RangeNumberType,
4646 typename KernelNumberType,
4647 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
4648void
4649aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
4650 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> &rkmat,
4651 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
4652 &aca_config,
4653 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, KernelNumberType> &kernel,
4654 const KernelNumberType kernel_factor,
4655 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
4656 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
4657 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &row_dof_index_range,
4658 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> &col_dof_index_range,
4659 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
4660 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
4661 const BEMValues<dim,
4662 spacedim,
4663 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
4664 &bem_values,
4665 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
4666 dim,
4667 spacedim,
4668 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
4669 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
4670 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4671 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
4672 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4673 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4674 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4675 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
4676 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
4677 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
4678 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
4679 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
4680 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data)
4681{
4682 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
4683 using CUDARangeNumberType = DeviceNumberType<RangeNumberType>;
4684 using CUDAKernelNumberType = DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>;
4685 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
4686 static_assert(
4687 std::is_same<
4688 real_type,
4689 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
4690
4694 const size_type m = row_dof_index_range[1] - row_dof_index_range[0];
4695 const size_type n = col_dof_index_range[1] - col_dof_index_range[0];
4696
4697 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_m(), m);
4698 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_n(), n);
4699
4704 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
4705 dim,
4706 spacedim,
4707 CUDARangeNumberType,
4708 CUDAKernelNumberType>
4709 sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector(n,
4710 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
4711 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
4712 bem_values,
4713 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
4714 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskBufferForVector<
4715 dim,
4716 spacedim,
4717 CUDARangeNumberType,
4718 CUDAKernelNumberType>
4719 sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector(m,
4720 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
4721 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.max_cells_per_dof,
4722 bem_values,
4723 scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
4724
4729 const unsigned int effective_max_iter =
4730 (aca_config.max_iter > std::min(m, n)) ? std::min(m, n) :
4731 aca_config.max_iter;
4732
4737 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> row_dof_indices(m);
4738 std::vector<types::global_dof_index> col_dof_indices(n);
4739 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
4740 row_dof_indices, row_dof_index_range[0]);
4741 gen_linear_indices<vector_uta, types::global_dof_index>(
4742 col_dof_indices, col_dof_index_range[0]);
4743
4750 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_formal_rank(), effective_max_iter);
4751 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &u_mat = rkmat.get_A();
4752 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &v_mat = rkmat.get_B();
4753 u_mat = RangeNumberType();
4754 v_mat = RangeNumberType();
4755
4760 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_row_indices(m);
4761 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_col_indices(n);
4762
4763 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_row_indices);
4764 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_col_indices);
4765
4770 Vector<RangeNumberType> vr(n);
4771 Vector<RangeNumberType> uc(m);
4772
4773 AssertCuda(
4774 cudaHostRegister((void *)(vr.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * n, 0));
4775 AssertCuda(
4776 cudaHostRegister((void *)(uc.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * m, 0));
4777
4778 size_type r = random_select_ref_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4779 vr,
4780 kernel,
4781 kernel_factor,
4782 mass_vmult_weq,
4783 stabilization_factor,
4784 remaining_row_indices,
4785 m,
4786 m,
4787 row_dof_indices,
4788 col_dof_indices,
4789 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4790 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4791 bem_values_gpu,
4792 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4793 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4794 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4795 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4796 mappings,
4797 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4798 normal_detector,
4799 scratch_data,
4800 copy_data);
4801
4802 if (r == m)
4803 {
4804 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the current matrix
4805 // block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
4806 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
4807
4808 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4809 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4810
4811 return;
4812 }
4813
4814 size_type c = random_select_ref_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
4815 uc,
4816 kernel,
4817 kernel_factor,
4818 mass_vmult_weq,
4819 stabilization_factor,
4820 remaining_col_indices,
4821 n,
4822 n,
4823 row_dof_indices,
4824 col_dof_indices,
4825 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4826 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4827 bem_values_gpu,
4828 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4829 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4830 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4831 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4832 mappings,
4833 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4834 normal_detector,
4835 scratch_data,
4836 copy_data);
4837
4838 if (c == n)
4839 {
4840 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the current
4841 // matrix block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
4842 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
4843
4844 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
4845 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
4846
4847 return;
4848 }
4849
4853 Vector<real_type> vr_abs(n);
4854 Vector<real_type> uc_abs(m);
4855
4863 std::transform(vr.begin(),
4864 vr.end(),
4865 vr_abs.begin(),
4866 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4867 return std::abs(val);
4868 });
4869 std::transform(uc.begin(),
4870 uc.end(),
4871 uc_abs.begin(),
4872 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4873 return std::abs(val);
4874 });
4875
4880 size_type ik, jk;
4881
4885 Vector<RangeNumberType> vk(n);
4886 Vector<RangeNumberType> uk(m);
4887
4888 AssertCuda(
4889 cudaHostRegister((void *)(vk.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * n, 0));
4890 AssertCuda(
4891 cudaHostRegister((void *)(uk.data()), sizeof(RangeNumberType) * m, 0));
4892
4897 Vector<real_type> vk_abs(n);
4898 Vector<real_type> uk_abs(m);
4899
4903 Vector<RangeNumberType> vl(n);
4904 Vector<RangeNumberType> ul(m);
4905
4909 real_type error_threshold = 0.;
4910
4914 for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= effective_max_iter; k++)
4915 {
4919 // N.B. The function @p std::max_element return the iterator pointing
4920 // to the maximum element in the list.
4921 size_type i_star =
4922 std::distance(uc_abs.begin(),
4923 std::max_element(uc_abs.begin(), uc_abs.end()));
4924
4928 size_type j_star =
4929 std::distance(vr_abs.begin(),
4930 std::max_element(vr_abs.begin(), vr_abs.end()));
4931
4932 if (uc_abs(i_star) > vr_abs(j_star))
4933 {
4937 ik = i_star;
4938
4942 assemble_kernel_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
4943 vk,
4944 kernel,
4945 kernel_factor,
4946 mass_vmult_weq,
4947 stabilization_factor,
4948 row_dof_indices[ik],
4949 col_dof_indices,
4950 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4951 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
4952 bem_values_gpu,
4953 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4954 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
4955 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
4956 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
4957 mappings,
4958 material_id_to_mapping_index,
4959 normal_detector,
4960 scratch_data,
4961 copy_data);
4962
4971 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
4972 {
4976 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
4977 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
4978
4979 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
4980 }
4981
4986 std::transform(vk.begin(),
4987 vk.end(),
4988 vk_abs.begin(),
4989 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
4990 return std::abs(val);
4991 });
4992 jk = std::distance(vk_abs.begin(),
4993 std::max_element(vk_abs.begin(), vk_abs.end()));
4994
4998 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
4999 vk /= value_at_cross;
5000
5004 assemble_kernel_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
5005 uk,
5006 kernel,
5007 kernel_factor,
5008 mass_vmult_weq,
5009 stabilization_factor,
5010 row_dof_indices,
5011 col_dof_indices[jk],
5012 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5013 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5014 bem_values_gpu,
5015 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5016 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5017 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
5018 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
5019 mappings,
5020 material_id_to_mapping_index,
5021 normal_detector,
5022 scratch_data,
5023 copy_data);
5024
5025 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5026 {
5030 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5031 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5032
5033 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
5034 }
5035 }
5036 else
5037 {
5041 jk = j_star;
5042
5046 assemble_kernel_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
5047 uk,
5048 kernel,
5049 kernel_factor,
5050 mass_vmult_weq,
5051 stabilization_factor,
5052 row_dof_indices,
5053 col_dof_indices[jk],
5054 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5055 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5056 bem_values_gpu,
5057 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5058 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5059 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
5060 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
5061 mappings,
5062 material_id_to_mapping_index,
5063 normal_detector,
5064 scratch_data,
5065 copy_data);
5066
5067 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5068 {
5072 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5073 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5074
5075 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
5076 }
5077
5082 std::transform(uk.begin(),
5083 uk.end(),
5084 uk_abs.begin(),
5085 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5086 return std::abs(val);
5087 });
5088 ik = std::distance(uk_abs.begin(),
5089 std::max_element(uk_abs.begin(), uk_abs.end()));
5090
5094 assemble_kernel_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
5095 vk,
5096 kernel,
5097 kernel_factor,
5098 mass_vmult_weq,
5099 stabilization_factor,
5100 row_dof_indices[ik],
5101 col_dof_indices,
5102 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5103 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5104 bem_values_gpu,
5105 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5106 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5107 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
5108 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
5109 mappings,
5110 material_id_to_mapping_index,
5111 normal_detector,
5112 scratch_data,
5113 copy_data);
5114
5115 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5116 {
5120 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5121 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5122
5123 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
5124 }
5125
5129 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
5130 vk /= value_at_cross;
5131 }
5132
5137 u_mat.fill_col(k - 1, uk, false);
5138 v_mat.fill_col(k - 1, vk, false);
5139
5140 if (k == 1)
5141 {
5145 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * rkmat.frobenius_norm(1);
5146 }
5147
5148 remaining_row_indices.remove(ik);
5149 remaining_col_indices.remove(jk);
5150
5151 if (ik == r)
5152 {
5157 r = random_select_ref_row(sauter_task_buffer_for_row_vector,
5158 vr,
5159 kernel,
5160 kernel_factor,
5161 mass_vmult_weq,
5162 stabilization_factor,
5163 remaining_row_indices,
5164 r,
5165 m,
5166 row_dof_indices,
5167 col_dof_indices,
5168 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5169 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5170 bem_values_gpu,
5171 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5172 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5173 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
5174 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
5175 mappings,
5176 material_id_to_mapping_index,
5177 normal_detector,
5178 scratch_data,
5179 copy_data);
5180
5181 if (r == m)
5182 {
5183 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the ACA+
5184 // iteration should stop here.
5185 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5186 {
5193 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5194 }
5195
5196 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
5197 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
5198 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
5199 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
5200
5206 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
5207 v_mat.conjugate();
5208
5209 return;
5210 }
5211 else
5212 {
5213 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
5214 {
5218 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5219 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5220
5221 vr.add(-ul(r), vl);
5222 }
5223 }
5224 }
5225 else
5226 {
5230 vr.add(-uk(r), vk);
5231 }
5232
5236 std::transform(vr.begin(),
5237 vr.end(),
5238 vr_abs.begin(),
5239 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5240 return std::abs(val);
5241 });
5242
5243 if (jk == c)
5244 {
5249 c = random_select_ref_column(sauter_task_buffer_for_col_vector,
5250 uc,
5251 kernel,
5252 kernel_factor,
5253 mass_vmult_weq,
5254 stabilization_factor,
5255 remaining_col_indices,
5256 c,
5257 n,
5258 row_dof_indices,
5259 col_dof_indices,
5260 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5261 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
5262 bem_values_gpu,
5263 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5264 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5265 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
5266 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
5267 mappings,
5268 material_id_to_mapping_index,
5269 normal_detector,
5270 scratch_data,
5271 copy_data);
5272
5273 if (c == n)
5274 {
5275 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the ACA+
5276 // iteration should stop here.
5277 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5278 {
5285 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5286 }
5287
5288 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
5289 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
5290 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
5291 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
5292
5298 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
5299 v_mat.conjugate();
5300
5301 return;
5302 }
5303 else
5304 {
5305 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
5306 {
5310 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5311 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5312
5313 uc.add(-vl(c), ul);
5314 }
5315 }
5316 }
5317 else
5318 {
5322 uc.add(-vk(c), uk);
5323 }
5324
5328 std::transform(uc.begin(),
5329 uc.end(),
5330 uc_abs.begin(),
5331 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5332 return std::abs(val);
5333 });
5334
5338 if ((k > 1) && (uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() <= error_threshold))
5339 {
5340 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5341 {
5347 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5348 }
5349
5350 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
5351 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
5352 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
5353 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
5354
5360 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
5361 v_mat.conjugate();
5362
5363 return;
5364 }
5365 else
5366 {
5367 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 0)
5368 {
5369 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5370 {
5377 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5378 }
5379
5380 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
5381 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
5382 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
5383 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
5384
5390 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
5391 v_mat.conjugate();
5392
5393 return;
5394 }
5395 }
5396 }
5397
5398 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vr.data())));
5399 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uc.data())));
5400 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(vk.data())));
5401 AssertCuda(cudaHostUnregister((void *)(uk.data())));
5402
5408 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::is_complex)
5409 v_mat.conjugate();
5410
5411 std::cerr
5412 << "Maximum H-matrix rank has been reached and the approximation accuracy has not been achieved, exit early!"
5413 << std::endl;
5414}
5415
5416
5430template <typename RangeNumberType = double>
5431void
5432aca_plus(
5433 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> &rkmat,
5434 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
5435 &aca_config,
5436 const LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &A)
5437{
5438 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
5439
5440 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_m(), A.m());
5441 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_n(), A.n());
5442
5446 const size_type m = A.m();
5447 const size_type n = A.n();
5448
5455 AssertDimension(rkmat.get_formal_rank(), aca_config.max_iter);
5456 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &u_mat = rkmat.get_A();
5457 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> &v_mat = rkmat.get_B();
5458 u_mat = RangeNumberType();
5459 v_mat = RangeNumberType();
5460
5465 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_row_indices(m);
5466 std::forward_list<size_type> remaining_col_indices(n);
5467
5468 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_row_indices);
5469 gen_linear_indices<forward_list_uta, size_type>(remaining_col_indices);
5470
5475 Vector<RangeNumberType> vr(n);
5476 Vector<RangeNumberType> uc(m);
5477
5478 size_type r = random_select_ref_row(vr, A, remaining_row_indices, m, m);
5479
5480 if (r == m)
5481 {
5482 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the current matrix
5483 // block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
5484 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
5485 return;
5486 }
5487
5488 size_type c = random_select_ref_column(uc, A, remaining_col_indices, n, n);
5489
5490 if (c == n)
5491 {
5492 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the current
5493 // matrix block is purely zero. Then return a zero rank-k matrix.
5494 rkmat.reinit(m, n, 0);
5495 return;
5496 }
5497
5501 Vector<real_type> vr_abs(n);
5502 Vector<real_type> uc_abs(m);
5503
5511 std::transform(vr.begin(),
5512 vr.end(),
5513 vr_abs.begin(),
5514 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5515 return std::abs(val);
5516 });
5517 std::transform(uc.begin(),
5518 uc.end(),
5519 uc_abs.begin(),
5520 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5521 return std::abs(val);
5522 });
5523
5528 size_type ik, jk;
5529
5533 Vector<RangeNumberType> vk(n);
5534 Vector<RangeNumberType> uk(m);
5535
5540 Vector<real_type> vk_abs(n);
5541 Vector<real_type> uk_abs(m);
5542
5546 Vector<RangeNumberType> vl(n);
5547 Vector<RangeNumberType> ul(m);
5548
5552 for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= aca_config.max_iter; k++)
5553 {
5557 // N.B. The function @p std::max_element return the iterator pointing
5558 // to the maximum element in the list.
5559 size_type i_star =
5560 std::distance(uc_abs.begin(),
5561 std::max_element(uc_abs.begin(), uc_abs.end()));
5562
5566 size_type j_star =
5567 std::distance(vr_abs.begin(),
5568 std::max_element(vr_abs.begin(), vr_abs.end()));
5569
5570 if (uc_abs(i_star) > vr_abs(j_star))
5571 {
5575 ik = i_star;
5576
5580 A.get_row(ik, vk);
5581
5590 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5591 {
5595 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5596 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5597
5598 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
5599 }
5600
5605 std::transform(vk.begin(),
5606 vk.end(),
5607 vk_abs.begin(),
5608 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5609 return std::abs(val);
5610 });
5611 jk = std::distance(vk_abs.begin(),
5612 std::max_element(vk_abs.begin(), vk_abs.end()));
5613
5617 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
5618 vk /= value_at_cross;
5619
5623 A.get_column(jk, uk);
5624
5625 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5626 {
5630 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5631 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5632
5633 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
5634 }
5635 }
5636 else
5637 {
5641 jk = j_star;
5642
5646 A.get_column(jk, uk);
5647
5648 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5649 {
5653 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5654 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5655
5656 uk.add(-vl(jk), ul);
5657 }
5658
5663 std::transform(uk.begin(),
5664 uk.end(),
5665 uk_abs.begin(),
5666 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5667 return std::abs(val);
5668 });
5669 ik = std::distance(uk_abs.begin(),
5670 std::max_element(uk_abs.begin(), uk_abs.end()));
5671
5675 A.get_row(ik, vk);
5676
5677 for (size_type l = 1; l < k; l++)
5678 {
5682 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5683 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5684
5685 vk.add(-ul(ik), vl);
5686 }
5687
5691 RangeNumberType value_at_cross = vk(jk);
5692 vk /= value_at_cross;
5693 }
5694
5699 u_mat.fill_col(k - 1, uk, false);
5700 v_mat.fill_col(k - 1, vk, false);
5701
5702 remaining_row_indices.remove(ik);
5703 remaining_col_indices.remove(jk);
5704
5705 if (ik == r)
5706 {
5711 r = random_select_ref_row(vr, A, remaining_row_indices, r, m);
5712
5713 if (r == m)
5714 {
5715 // When there is no reference row can be selected, the ACA+
5716 // iteration should stop here.
5717 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5718 {
5725 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5726 }
5727
5733 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::is_complex)
5734 v_mat.conjugate();
5735
5736 return;
5737 }
5738 else
5739 {
5740 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
5741 {
5745 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5746 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5747
5748 vr.add(-ul(r), vl);
5749 }
5750 }
5751 }
5752 else
5753 {
5757 vr.add(-uk(r), vk);
5758 }
5759
5763 std::transform(vr.begin(),
5764 vr.end(),
5765 vr_abs.begin(),
5766 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5767 return std::abs(val);
5768 });
5769
5770 if (jk == c)
5771 {
5776 c = random_select_ref_column(uc, A, remaining_col_indices, c, n);
5777
5778 if (c == n)
5779 {
5780 // When there is no reference column can be selected, the ACA+
5781 // iteration should stop here.
5782 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5783 {
5790 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5791 }
5792
5798 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::is_complex)
5799 v_mat.conjugate();
5800
5801 return;
5802 }
5803 else
5804 {
5805 for (unsigned int l = 1; l <= k; l++)
5806 {
5810 u_mat.get_column(l - 1, ul);
5811 v_mat.get_column(l - 1, vl);
5812
5813 uc.add(-vl(c), ul);
5814 }
5815 }
5816 }
5817 else
5818 {
5822 uc.add(-vk(c), uk);
5823 }
5824
5828 std::transform(uc.begin(),
5829 uc.end(),
5830 uc_abs.begin(),
5831 [](const RangeNumberType &val) -> real_type {
5832 return std::abs(val);
5833 });
5834
5838 real_type error_threshold = 0.;
5839 // DEBUG
5840 if (k > 1)
5841 {
5842 if (aca_config.eta >= 1.0)
5843 {
5844 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * rkmat.frobenius_norm(1);
5845 }
5846 else
5847 {
5848 error_threshold = aca_config.epsilon * (1.0 - aca_config.eta) /
5849 (1.0 + aca_config.epsilon) *
5850 rkmat.frobenius_norm(k - 1);
5851 }
5852
5853 deallog << "uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm(): "
5854 << uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() << "\n"
5855 << "error_threshold: " << error_threshold << std::endl;
5856 }
5857 else
5858 {
5859 deallog << "uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm(): "
5860 << uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() << std::endl;
5861 }
5862
5863 if ((k > 1) && (uk.l2_norm() * vk.l2_norm() <= error_threshold))
5864 {
5865 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5866 {
5872 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5873 // DEBUG
5874 deallog << "Early successful return from ACA+!" << std::endl;
5875 }
5876
5882 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::is_complex)
5883 v_mat.conjugate();
5884
5885 return;
5886 }
5887 else
5888 {
5889 if (size(remaining_row_indices) == 0)
5890 {
5891 if (k < aca_config.max_iter)
5892 {
5899 rkmat.keep_first_n_columns(k);
5900 }
5901
5907 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::is_complex)
5908 v_mat.conjugate();
5909
5910 return;
5911 }
5912 }
5913 }
5914
5920 if constexpr (numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::is_complex)
5921 v_mat.conjugate();
5922
5923 std::cerr
5924 << "Maximum H-matrix rank has been reached and the approximation accuracy has not been achieved, exit early!"
5925 << std::endl;
5926}
5927
5928
5973template <int dim,
5974 int spacedim,
5975 template <int, typename>
5976 typename KernelFunctionType,
5977 typename RangeNumberType,
5978 typename KernelNumberType,
5979 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
5980void
5981fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
5982 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat,
5983 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
5984 &aca_config,
5985 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
5986 &kernel,
5987 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
5988 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
5989 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
5990 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
5991 dim,
5992 spacedim,
5993 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
5994 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
5995 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
5996 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
5997 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
5998 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
5999 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6000 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6001 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6002 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
6003 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
6004 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
6005 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
6006 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
6007 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
6008 dim,
6009 spacedim,
6010 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
6011 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data,
6012 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
6013{
6014 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
6015 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
6016 static_assert(
6017 std::is_same<
6018 real_type,
6019 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
6020
6021#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
6022 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
6023 "fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus");
6024#endif
6025
6029 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
6030 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
6031 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
6032 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
6033
6038 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
6039 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
6040
6041 switch (leaf_mat->get_type())
6042 {
6043 case FullMatrixType: {
6044 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> *fullmat =
6045 leaf_mat->get_fullmatrix();
6046
6047 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
6048 {
6054 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
6055 {
6056 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
6061 Assert(leaf_mat->get_property() ==
6062 HMatrixSupport::Property::symmetric,
6063 ExcInvalidHMatrixProperty(
6064 leaf_mat->get_property()));
6065 Assert(fullmat->get_property() ==
6066 LAPACKSupport::Property::symmetric,
6067 ExcInvalidLAPACKFullMatrixProperty(
6068 fullmat->get_property()));
6069
6074 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6075 {
6076 i_global_dof_index =
6077 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6078 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6079 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6080 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6081 i]);
6082
6083 for (size_t j = 0; j <= i; j++)
6084 {
6085 j_global_dof_index =
6086 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6087 nullptr) ?
6088 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6089 j] :
6090 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6091 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6092 j]);
6093
6094 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6095 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6096 kernel,
6097 kernel_factor,
6098 i_global_dof_index,
6099 j_global_dof_index,
6100 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6101 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6102 bem_values_gpu,
6103 mappings,
6104 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6105 normal_detector,
6106 scratch_data,
6107 scratch_data_gpu,
6108 copy_data);
6109 }
6110 }
6111
6112 break;
6113 }
6114 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
6120 break;
6121 }
6122 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
6128 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6129 {
6130 i_global_dof_index =
6131 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6132 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6133 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6134 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6135 i]);
6136
6137 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
6138 {
6139 j_global_dof_index =
6140 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6141 nullptr) ?
6142 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6143 j] :
6144 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6145 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6146 j]);
6147
6148 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6149 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6150 kernel,
6151 kernel_factor,
6152 i_global_dof_index,
6153 j_global_dof_index,
6154 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6155 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6156 bem_values_gpu,
6157 mappings,
6158 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6159 normal_detector,
6160 scratch_data,
6161 scratch_data_gpu,
6162 copy_data);
6163 }
6164 }
6165
6166 break;
6167 }
6168 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
6169 Assert(false,
6170 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
6171 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
6172
6173 break;
6174 }
6175 }
6176 }
6177 else
6178 {
6182 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6183 {
6184 i_global_dof_index =
6185 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6186 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6187 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6188 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i]);
6189
6190 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
6191 {
6192 j_global_dof_index =
6193 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6194 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j] :
6195 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6196 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j]);
6197
6198 (*fullmat)(i, j) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6199 kernel,
6200 kernel_factor,
6201 i_global_dof_index,
6202 j_global_dof_index,
6203 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6204 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6205 bem_values_gpu,
6206 mappings,
6207 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6208 normal_detector,
6209 scratch_data,
6210 scratch_data_gpu,
6211 copy_data);
6212 }
6213 }
6214 }
6215
6216 break;
6217 }
6218 case RkMatrixType: {
6227 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> *rkmat = leaf_mat->get_rkmatrix();
6228
6229 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
6230 {
6231 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
6232 {
6233 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
6238 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
6239 (*rkmat),
6240 aca_config,
6241 kernel,
6242 kernel_factor,
6243 *row_index_range,
6244 *col_index_range,
6245 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6246 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6247 bem_values_gpu,
6248 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6249 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6250 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6251 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6252 mappings,
6253 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6254 normal_detector,
6255 scratch_data,
6256 scratch_data_gpu,
6257 copy_data);
6258
6259 break;
6260 }
6261 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
6267 break;
6268 }
6269 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
6273 Assert(false,
6274 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
6275 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
6276
6277 break;
6278 }
6279 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
6280 Assert(false,
6281 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
6282 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
6283
6284 break;
6285 }
6286 }
6287 }
6288 else
6289 {
6290 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
6291 (*rkmat),
6292 aca_config,
6293 kernel,
6294 kernel_factor,
6295 (*row_index_range),
6296 (*col_index_range),
6297 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6298 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6299 bem_values_gpu,
6300 kx_dof_handler,
6301 ky_dof_handler,
6302 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6303 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6304 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6305 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6306 mappings,
6307 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6308 normal_detector,
6309 scratch_data,
6310 scratch_data_gpu,
6311 copy_data);
6312 }
6313
6314 break;
6315 }
6316 default: {
6317 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(leaf_mat->get_type()));
6318 break;
6319 }
6320 }
6321}
6322
6323
6392template <int dim,
6393 int spacedim,
6394 template <int, typename>
6395 typename KernelFunctionType,
6396 typename RangeNumberType,
6397 typename KernelNumberType,
6398 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
6399void
6400fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
6401 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat,
6402 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
6403 &aca_config,
6404 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
6405 &kernel,
6406 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
6407 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
6408 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
6409 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6410 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6411 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
6412 dim,
6413 spacedim,
6414 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
6415 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
6416 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
6417 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
6418 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6419 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
6420 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6421 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6422 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6423 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
6424 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
6425 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
6426 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
6427 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
6428 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
6429 dim,
6430 spacedim,
6431 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
6432 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data,
6433 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
6434{
6435 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
6436 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
6437 static_assert(
6438 std::is_same<
6439 real_type,
6440 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
6441
6442#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
6443 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
6444 "fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus for hypersingular");
6445#endif
6446
6447 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
6448 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
6449 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
6450 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
6451
6452 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
6453 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
6454
6455 switch (leaf_mat->get_type())
6456 {
6457 case FullMatrixType: {
6458 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> *fullmat =
6459 leaf_mat->get_fullmatrix();
6460
6461 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
6462 {
6468 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
6469 {
6470 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
6475 Assert(leaf_mat->get_property() ==
6476 HMatrixSupport::Property::symmetric,
6477 ExcInvalidHMatrixProperty(
6478 leaf_mat->get_property()));
6479 Assert(fullmat->get_property() ==
6480 LAPACKSupport::Property::symmetric,
6481 ExcInvalidLAPACKFullMatrixProperty(
6482 fullmat->get_property()));
6483
6488 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6489 {
6490 i_global_dof_index =
6491 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6492 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6493 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6494 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6495 i]);
6496
6497 for (size_t j = 0; j <= i; j++)
6498 {
6499 j_global_dof_index =
6500 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6501 nullptr) ?
6502 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6503 j] :
6504 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6505 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6506 j]);
6507
6508 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6509 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6510 kernel,
6511 kernel_factor,
6512 i_global_dof_index,
6513 j_global_dof_index,
6514 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6515 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6516 bem_values_gpu,
6517 mappings,
6518 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6519 normal_detector,
6520 scratch_data,
6521 scratch_data_gpu,
6522 copy_data);
6523
6524 // N.B. The internal and local DoF indices are
6525 // used directly to access the result vector
6526 // of \f$M w_{\rm eq}\f$.
6527 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
6528 (*fullmat)(i, j) +=
6529 stabilization_factor *
6530 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
6531 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
6532 }
6533 }
6534
6535 break;
6536 }
6537 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
6543 break;
6544 }
6545 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
6551 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6552 {
6553 i_global_dof_index =
6554 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6555 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6556 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6557 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6558 i]);
6559
6560 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
6561 {
6562 j_global_dof_index =
6563 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6564 nullptr) ?
6565 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6566 j] :
6567 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6568 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6569 j]);
6570
6571 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6572 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6573 kernel,
6574 kernel_factor,
6575 i_global_dof_index,
6576 j_global_dof_index,
6577 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6578 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6579 bem_values_gpu,
6580 mappings,
6581 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6582 normal_detector,
6583 scratch_data,
6584 scratch_data_gpu,
6585 copy_data);
6586
6587 // N.B. The internal and local DoF indices are
6588 // used directly to access the result vector
6589 // of \f$M w_{\rm eq}\f$.
6590 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
6591 (*fullmat)(i, j) +=
6592 stabilization_factor *
6593 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
6594 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
6595 }
6596 }
6597
6598 break;
6599 }
6600 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
6601 Assert(false,
6602 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
6603 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
6604
6605 break;
6606 }
6607 }
6608 }
6609 else
6610 {
6614 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6615 {
6616 i_global_dof_index =
6617 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6618 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6619 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6620 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i]);
6621
6622 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
6623 {
6624 j_global_dof_index =
6625 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6626 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j] :
6627 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6628 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j]);
6629
6630 (*fullmat)(i, j) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6631 kernel,
6632 kernel_factor,
6633 i_global_dof_index,
6634 j_global_dof_index,
6635 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6636 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6637 bem_values_gpu,
6638 mappings,
6639 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6640 normal_detector,
6641 scratch_data,
6642 scratch_data_gpu,
6643 copy_data);
6644
6645 // N.B. The internal and local DoF indices are
6646 // used directly to access the result vector of
6647 // \f$M w_{\rm eq}\f$.
6648 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
6649 (*fullmat)(i, j) += stabilization_factor *
6650 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
6651 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
6652 }
6653 }
6654 }
6655
6656 break;
6657 }
6658 case RkMatrixType: {
6667 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> *rkmat = leaf_mat->get_rkmatrix();
6668
6669 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
6670 {
6671 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
6672 {
6673 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
6678 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
6679 (*rkmat),
6680 aca_config,
6681 kernel,
6682 kernel_factor,
6683 mass_vmult_weq,
6684 stabilization_factor,
6685 *row_index_range,
6686 *col_index_range,
6687 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6688 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6689 bem_values_gpu,
6690 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6691 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6692 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6693 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6694 mappings,
6695 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6696 normal_detector,
6697 scratch_data,
6698 scratch_data_gpu,
6699 copy_data);
6700
6701 break;
6702 }
6703 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
6709 break;
6710 }
6711 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block:
6715 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
6716 Assert(false,
6717 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
6718 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
6719
6720 break;
6721 }
6722 }
6723 }
6724 else
6725 {
6726 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
6727 (*rkmat),
6728 aca_config,
6729 kernel,
6730 kernel_factor,
6731 mass_vmult_weq,
6732 stabilization_factor,
6733 (*row_index_range),
6734 (*col_index_range),
6735 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6736 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6737 bem_values_gpu,
6738 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6739 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6740 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6741 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6742 mappings,
6743 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6744 normal_detector,
6745 scratch_data,
6746 scratch_data_gpu,
6747 copy_data);
6748 }
6749
6750 break;
6751 }
6752 default: {
6753 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(leaf_mat->get_type()));
6754 break;
6755 }
6756 }
6757}
6758
6759
6809template <int dim,
6810 int spacedim,
6811 template <int, typename>
6812 typename KernelFunctionType,
6813 typename RangeNumberType,
6814 typename KernelNumberType,
6815 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
6816void
6817fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
6818 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat,
6819 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
6820 &aca_config,
6821 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
6822 &kernel,
6823 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
6824 const typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type
6825 mass_matrix_factor,
6826 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
6827 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
6828 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
6829 dim,
6830 spacedim,
6831 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
6832 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
6833 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
6834 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
6835 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6836 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
6837 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
6838 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
6839 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
6840 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
6841 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
6842 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
6843 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
6844 CellWiseScratchDataForMassMatrix<dim, spacedim> &mass_matrix_scratch_data,
6845 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
6846 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<
6847 dim,
6848 spacedim,
6849 DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>> &scratch_data_gpu,
6850 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data,
6851 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
6852{
6853 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
6854 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
6855 static_assert(
6856 std::is_same<
6857 real_type,
6858 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
6859
6860#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
6861 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
6862 "fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus with mass matrix");
6863#endif
6864
6865 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
6866 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
6867 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
6868 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
6869
6870 types::global_dof_index i_global_dof_index;
6871 types::global_dof_index j_global_dof_index;
6872
6873 switch (leaf_mat->get_type())
6874 {
6875 case FullMatrixType: {
6876 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> *fullmat =
6877 leaf_mat->get_fullmatrix();
6878
6879 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
6880 {
6886 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
6887 {
6888 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
6893 Assert(leaf_mat->get_property() ==
6894 HMatrixSupport::Property::symmetric,
6895 ExcInvalidHMatrixProperty(
6896 leaf_mat->get_property()));
6897 Assert(fullmat->get_property() ==
6898 LAPACKSupport::Property::symmetric,
6899 ExcInvalidLAPACKFullMatrixProperty(
6900 fullmat->get_property()));
6901
6906 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6907 {
6908 i_global_dof_index =
6909 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6910 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6911 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6912 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6913 i]);
6914
6915 for (size_t j = 0; j <= i; j++)
6916 {
6917 j_global_dof_index =
6918 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6919 nullptr) ?
6920 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6921 j] :
6922 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6923 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6924 j]);
6925
6926 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6927 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6928 kernel,
6929 kernel_factor,
6930 mass_matrix_factor,
6931 i_global_dof_index,
6932 j_global_dof_index,
6933 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6934 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6935 bem_values_gpu,
6936 mappings,
6937 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6938 normal_detector,
6939 mass_matrix_scratch_data,
6940 scratch_data,
6941 scratch_data_gpu,
6942 copy_data);
6943 }
6944 }
6945
6946 break;
6947 }
6948 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
6954 break;
6955 }
6956 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
6962 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
6963 {
6964 i_global_dof_index =
6965 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
6966 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
6967 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6968 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] +
6969 i]);
6970
6971 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
6972 {
6973 j_global_dof_index =
6974 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices ==
6975 nullptr) ?
6976 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6977 j] :
6978 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
6979 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] +
6980 j]);
6981
6982 (*fullmat)(i, j) =
6983 sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
6984 kernel,
6985 kernel_factor,
6986 mass_matrix_factor,
6987 i_global_dof_index,
6988 j_global_dof_index,
6989 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6990 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
6991 bem_values_gpu,
6992 mappings,
6993 material_id_to_mapping_index,
6994 normal_detector,
6995 mass_matrix_scratch_data,
6996 scratch_data,
6997 scratch_data_gpu,
6998 copy_data);
6999 }
7000 }
7001
7002 break;
7003 }
7004 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
7005 Assert(false,
7006 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7007 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7008
7009 break;
7010 }
7011 }
7012 }
7013 else
7014 {
7015 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
7016 {
7017 i_global_dof_index =
7018 (kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
7019 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i] :
7020 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
7021 kx_dof_i2e_numbering[(*row_index_range)[0] + i]);
7022
7023 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
7024 {
7025 j_global_dof_index =
7026 (ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices == nullptr) ?
7027 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j] :
7028 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices->at(
7029 ky_dof_i2e_numbering[(*col_index_range)[0] + j]);
7030
7031 (*fullmat)(i, j) = sauter_quadrature_on_one_pair_of_dofs(
7032 kernel,
7033 kernel_factor,
7034 mass_matrix_factor,
7035 i_global_dof_index,
7036 j_global_dof_index,
7037 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
7038 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
7039 bem_values_gpu,
7040 mappings,
7041 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7042 normal_detector,
7043 mass_matrix_scratch_data,
7044 scratch_data,
7045 scratch_data_gpu,
7046 copy_data);
7047 }
7048 }
7049 }
7050
7051 break;
7052 }
7053 case RkMatrixType: {
7054 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> *rkmat = leaf_mat->get_rkmatrix();
7055
7056 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
7057 {
7058 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
7059 {
7060 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
7065 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
7066 (*rkmat),
7067 aca_config,
7068 kernel,
7069 kernel_factor,
7070 *row_index_range,
7071 *col_index_range,
7072 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7073 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7074 bem_values_gpu,
7075 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7076 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7077 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7078 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7079 mappings,
7080 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7081 normal_detector,
7082 scratch_data,
7083 scratch_data_gpu,
7084 copy_data);
7085
7086 break;
7087 }
7088 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
7094 break;
7095 }
7096 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block:
7100 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
7101 Assert(false,
7102 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7103 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7104
7105 break;
7106 }
7107 }
7108 }
7109 else
7110 {
7111 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_vector_entry(
7112 (*rkmat),
7113 aca_config,
7114 kernel,
7115 kernel_factor,
7116 *row_index_range,
7117 *col_index_range,
7118 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7119 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7120 bem_values_gpu,
7121 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7122 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7123 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7124 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7125 mappings,
7126 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7127 normal_detector,
7128 scratch_data,
7129 scratch_data_gpu,
7130 copy_data);
7131 }
7132
7133 break;
7134 }
7135 default: {
7136 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(leaf_mat->get_type()));
7137 break;
7138 }
7139 }
7140}
7141
7142
7143template <int dim,
7144 int spacedim,
7145 template <int, typename>
7146 typename KernelFunctionType,
7147 typename RangeNumberType,
7148 typename KernelNumberType,
7149 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
7150void
7151fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
7152 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat,
7153 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7154 &aca_config,
7155 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
7156 &kernel,
7157 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
7158 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7159 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7160 const BEMValues<dim,
7161 spacedim,
7162 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7163 &bem_values,
7164 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
7165 dim,
7166 spacedim,
7167 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
7168 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7169 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7170 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7171 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7172 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7173 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7174 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
7175 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
7176 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
7177 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
7178 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
7179 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data,
7180 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
7181{
7182 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
7183 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
7184 static_assert(
7185 std::is_same<
7186 real_type,
7187 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
7188
7189#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
7190 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
7191 "fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus");
7192#endif
7193
7197 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
7198 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
7199 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
7200 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
7201
7202 switch (leaf_mat->get_type())
7203 {
7204 case FullMatrixType: {
7205 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(FullMatrixType));
7206
7207 break;
7208 }
7209 case RkMatrixType: {
7218 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> *rkmat = leaf_mat->get_rkmatrix();
7219
7220 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
7221 {
7222 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
7223 {
7224 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
7229 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
7230 (*rkmat),
7231 aca_config,
7232 kernel,
7233 kernel_factor,
7234 *row_index_range,
7235 *col_index_range,
7236 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7237 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7238 bem_values,
7239 bem_values_gpu,
7240 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7241 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7242 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7243 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7244 mappings,
7245 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7246 normal_detector,
7247 scratch_data,
7248 copy_data);
7249
7250 break;
7251 }
7252 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
7258 break;
7259 }
7260 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
7264 Assert(false,
7265 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7266 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7267
7268 break;
7269 }
7270 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
7271 Assert(false,
7272 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7273 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7274
7275 break;
7276 }
7277 }
7278 }
7279 else
7280 {
7281 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
7282 (*rkmat),
7283 aca_config,
7284 kernel,
7285 kernel_factor,
7286 (*row_index_range),
7287 (*col_index_range),
7288 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7289 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7290 bem_values,
7291 bem_values_gpu,
7292 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7293 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7294 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7295 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7296 mappings,
7297 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7298 normal_detector,
7299 scratch_data,
7300 copy_data);
7301 }
7302
7303 break;
7304 }
7305 default: {
7306 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(leaf_mat->get_type()));
7307 break;
7308 }
7309 }
7310}
7311
7312
7313template <int dim,
7314 int spacedim,
7315 template <int, typename>
7316 typename KernelFunctionType,
7317 typename RangeNumberType,
7318 typename KernelNumberType,
7319 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
7320void
7321fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
7322 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat,
7323 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7324 &aca_config,
7325 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
7326 &kernel,
7327 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
7328 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
7329 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
7330 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7331 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7332 const BEMValues<dim,
7333 spacedim,
7334 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7335 &bem_values,
7336 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
7337 dim,
7338 spacedim,
7339 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
7340 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7341 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7342 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7343 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7344 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7345 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7346 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
7347 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
7348 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
7349 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
7350 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &scratch_data,
7351 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> &copy_data,
7352 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
7353{
7354 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
7355 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
7356 static_assert(
7357 std::is_same<
7358 real_type,
7359 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
7360
7361#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
7362 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
7363 "fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus for hypersingular");
7364#endif
7365
7366 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
7367 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
7368 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
7369 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
7370
7371 switch (leaf_mat->get_type())
7372 {
7373 case FullMatrixType: {
7374 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(FullMatrixType));
7375
7376 break;
7377 }
7378 case RkMatrixType: {
7387 RkMatrix<RangeNumberType> *rkmat = leaf_mat->get_rkmatrix();
7388
7389 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat && kernel.is_symmetric())
7390 {
7391 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
7392 {
7393 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
7398 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
7399 (*rkmat),
7400 aca_config,
7401 kernel,
7402 kernel_factor,
7403 mass_vmult_weq,
7404 stabilization_factor,
7405 *row_index_range,
7406 *col_index_range,
7407 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7408 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7409 bem_values,
7410 bem_values_gpu,
7411 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7412 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7413 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7414 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
