7415 mappings,
7416 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7417 normal_detector,
7418 scratch_data,
7419 copy_data);
7420
7421 break;
7422 }
7423 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
7429 break;
7430 }
7431 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block:
7435 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
7436 Assert(false,
7437 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7438 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7439
7440 break;
7441 }
7442 }
7443 }
7444 else
7445 {
7446 aca_plus_parallel_sauter_quad_for_whole_vector(
7447 (*rkmat),
7448 aca_config,
7449 kernel,
7450 kernel_factor,
7451 mass_vmult_weq,
7452 stabilization_factor,
7453 (*row_index_range),
7454 (*col_index_range),
7455 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7456 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7457 bem_values,
7458 bem_values_gpu,
7459 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7460 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7461 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7462 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7463 mappings,
7464 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7465 normal_detector,
7466 scratch_data,
7467 copy_data);
7468 }
7469
7470 break;
7471 }
7472 default: {
7473 Assert(false, ExcInvalidHMatrixType(leaf_mat->get_type()));
7474 break;
7475 }
7476 }
7477}
7478
7479
7499template <int dim,
7500 int spacedim,
7501 template <int, typename>
7502 typename KernelFunctionType,
7503 typename RangeNumberType,
7504 typename KernelNumberType,
7505 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
7506void
7507fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_subrange_with_aca_plus(
7508 const tbb::blocked_range<
7509 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>
7510 &range,
7511 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7512 &aca_config,
7513 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
7514 &kernel,
7515 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
7516 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7517 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7518 const BEMValues<dim,
7519 spacedim,
7520 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7521 &bem_values,
7522 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
7523 dim,
7524 spacedim,
7525 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
7526 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
7527 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
7528 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7529 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7530 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7531 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7532 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7533 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7534 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
7535 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
7536 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
7537 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
7538 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
7539{
7540 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
7541 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
7542 static_assert(
7543 std::is_same<
7544 real_type,
7545 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
7546
7547 const std::thread::id current_thread_id = std::this_thread::get_id();
7548 deallog << "WorkStream " << current_thread_id << " starts..." << std::endl;
7549
7555 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> scratch_data(
7556 current_thread_id,
7557 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7558 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7559 mappings,
7560 bem_values);
7561 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> copy_data(
7562 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe());
7563
7564 for (typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator
7565 iter = range.begin();
7566 iter != range.end();
7567 iter++)
7568 {
7569 fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
7570 (*iter),
7571 aca_config,
7572 kernel,
7573 kernel_factor,
7574 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7575 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7576 bem_values,
7577 bem_values_gpu,
7578 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7579 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7580 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7581 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7582 mappings,
7583 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7584 normal_detector,
7585 scratch_data,
7586 copy_data,
7587 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
7588 }
7589
7593 scratch_data.release();
7594 copy_data.release();
7595
7596 deallog << "WorkStream " << current_thread_id << " exits..." << std::endl;
7597}
7598
7599
7624template <int dim,
7625 int spacedim,
7626 template <int, typename>
7627 typename KernelFunctionType,
7628 typename RangeNumberType,
7629 typename KernelNumberType,
7630 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
7631void
7632fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_subrange_with_aca_plus(
7633 const tbb::blocked_range<
7634 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>
7635 &range,
7636 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7637 &aca_config,
7638 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
7639 &kernel,
7640 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
7641 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
7642 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
7643 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7644 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7645 const BEMValues<dim,
7646 spacedim,
7647 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7648 &bem_values,
7649 const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<
7650 dim,
7651 spacedim,
7652 typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type> &bem_values_gpu,
7653 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
7654 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
7655 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7656 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7657 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7658 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7659 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7660 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7661 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
7662 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
7663 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
7664 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
7665 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
7666{
7667 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
7668 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
7669 static_assert(
7670 std::is_same<
7671 real_type,
7672 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
7673
7674 const std::thread::id current_thread_id = std::this_thread::get_id();
7675 deallog << "WorkStream " << current_thread_id << " starts..." << std::endl;
7676
7682 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> scratch_data(
7683 current_thread_id,
7684 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7685 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7686 mappings,
7687 bem_values);
7688 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> copy_data(
7689 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe());
7690
7691 for (typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator
7692 iter = range.begin();
7693 iter != range.end();
7694 iter++)
7695 {
7696 fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
7697 (*iter),
7698 aca_config,
7699 kernel,
7700 kernel_factor,
7701 mass_vmult_weq,
7702 stabilization_factor,
7703 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7704 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7705 bem_values,
7706 bem_values_gpu,
7707 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7708 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7709 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7710 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7711 mappings,
7712 material_id_to_mapping_index,
7713 normal_detector,
7714 scratch_data,
7715 copy_data,
7716 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
7717 }
7718
7722 scratch_data.release();
7723 copy_data.release();
7724
7725 deallog << "WorkStream " << current_thread_id << " exits..." << std::endl;
7726}
7727
7728
7742template <int spacedim, typename RangeNumberType, typename KernelNumberType>
7743void
7744stabilize_near_field_hmatrices_for_hypersingular_kernel(
7745 const tbb::blocked_range<
7746 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>
7747 &range,
7748 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
7749 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
7750 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = true)
7751{
7752 for (typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator
7753 iter = range.begin();
7754 iter != range.end();
7755 iter++)
7756 {
7757 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat = (*iter);
7758 Assert(leaf_mat->get_type() == HMatrixType::FullMatrixType,
7759 ExcInternalError());
7760
7761 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *row_index_range =
7762 leaf_mat->get_row_index_range();
7763 const std::array<types::global_dof_index, 2> *col_index_range =
7764 leaf_mat->get_col_index_range();
7765
7766 LAPACKFullMatrixExt<RangeNumberType> *fullmat =
7767 leaf_mat->get_fullmatrix();
7768
7769 if (enable_build_symmetric_hmat)
7770 {
7775 switch (leaf_mat->get_block_type())
7776 {
7777 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::diagonal_block: {
7782 Assert(leaf_mat->get_property() ==
7783 HMatrixSupport::Property::symmetric,
7784 ExcInvalidHMatrixProperty(leaf_mat->get_property()));
7785 Assert(fullmat->get_property() ==
7786 LAPACKSupport::Property::symmetric,
7787 ExcInvalidLAPACKFullMatrixProperty(
7788 fullmat->get_property()));
7789
7790 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
7791 {
7792 for (size_t j = 0; j <= i; j++)
7793 {
7799 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
7800 (*fullmat)(i, j) += stabilization_factor *
7801 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
7802 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
7803 }
7804 }
7805
7806 break;
7807 }
7808 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::upper_triangular_block: {
7814 break;
7815 }
7816 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::lower_triangular_block: {
7822 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
7823 {
7824 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
7825 {
7826 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
7827 (*fullmat)(i, j) += stabilization_factor *
7828 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
7829 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
7830 }
7831 }
7832
7833 break;
7834 }
7835 case HMatrixSupport::BlockType::undefined_block: {
7836 Assert(false,
7837 ExcInvalidHMatrixBlockType(
7838 leaf_mat->get_block_type()));
7839
7840 break;
7841 }
7842 }
7843 }
7844 else
7845 {
7850 for (size_t i = 0; i < fullmat->m(); i++)
7851 {
7852 for (size_t j = 0; j < fullmat->n(); j++)
7853 {
7854 for (const auto &vec : mass_vmult_weq)
7855 (*fullmat)(i, j) += stabilization_factor *
7856 vec((*row_index_range)[0] + i) *
7857 vec((*col_index_range)[0] + j);
7858 }
7859 }
7860 }
7861 }
7862}
7863
7864
7902template <int dim,
7903 int spacedim,
7904 template <int, typename>
7905 typename KernelFunctionType,
7906 typename RangeNumberType,
7907 typename KernelNumberType,
7908 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
7909void
7910fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_serial(
7911 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
7912 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
7913 &aca_config,
7914 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, KernelNumberType> &kernel,
7915 const KernelNumberType kernel_factor,
7916 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
7917 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
7918 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
7919 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
7920 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
7921 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7922 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7923 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
7924 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
7925 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
7926 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
7927 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
7928 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
7929 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
7930 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
7931 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
7932{
7933 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
7934 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
7935 static_assert(
7936 std::is_same<
7937 real_type,
7938 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
7939
7957 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
7958 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7959 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
7960 mappings,
7961 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
7962 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
7963 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
7964 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
7965
7966 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
7967
7971 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
7972 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
7973
7979 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> scratch_data(
7980 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe(), mappings, bem_values);
7981 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> copy_data(
7982 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe());
7983
7987 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
7988 CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType>
7989 scratch_data_gpu;
7990 scratch_data_gpu.allocate(scratch_data);
7991
7992 for (HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat : hmat.get_leaf_set())
7993 {
7994 fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
7995 leaf_mat,
7996 aca_config,
7997 kernel,
7998 kernel_factor,
7999 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8000 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8001 bem_values_gpu,
8002 kx_dof_handler,
8003 ky_dof_handler,
8004 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8005 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8006 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8007 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8008 mappings,
8009 material_id_to_mapping_index,
8010 normal_detector,
8011 scratch_data,
8012 scratch_data_gpu,
8013 copy_data,
8014 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
8015 }
8016
8020 bem_values_gpu.release();
8021
8025 scratch_data.release();
8026 scratch_data_gpu.release(scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
8027 copy_data.release();
8028}
8029
8030
8085template <int dim,
8086 int spacedim,
8087 template <int, typename>
8088 typename KernelFunctionType,
8089 typename RangeNumberType,
8090 typename KernelNumberType,
8091 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
8092void
8093fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_serial(
8094 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
8095 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
8096 &aca_config,
8097 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, KernelNumberType> &kernel,
8098 const KernelNumberType kernel_factor,
8099 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
8100 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
8101 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8102 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8103 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
8104 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
8105 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
8106 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8107 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8108 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8109 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8110 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8111 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8112 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
8113 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
8114 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
8115 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
8116 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
8117{
8118 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
8119 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
8120 static_assert(
8121 std::is_same<
8122 real_type,
8123 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
8124
8142 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
8143 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8144 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8145 mappings,
8146 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
8147 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
8148 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
8149 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
8150
8151 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
8152
8156 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
8157 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
8158
8164 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> scratch_data(
8165 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe(), mappings, bem_values);
8166 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> copy_data(
8167 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe());
8168
8172 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8173 CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType>
8174 scratch_data_gpu;
8175 scratch_data_gpu.allocate(scratch_data);
8176
8177 for (HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat : hmat.get_leaf_set())
8178 {
8179 fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
8180 leaf_mat,
8181 aca_config,
8182 kernel,
8183 kernel_factor,
8184 mass_vmult_weq,
8185 stabilization_factor,
8186 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8187 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8188 bem_values_gpu,
8189 kx_dof_handler,
8190 ky_dof_handler,
8191 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8192 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8193 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8194 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8195 mappings,
8196 material_id_to_mapping_index,
8197 normal_detector,
8198 scratch_data,
8199 scratch_data_gpu,
8200 copy_data,
8201 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
8202 }
8203
8207 bem_values_gpu.release();
8208
8212 scratch_data.release();
8213 scratch_data_gpu.release(scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
8214 copy_data.release();
8215}
8216
8217
8259template <int dim,
8260 int spacedim,
8261 template <int, typename>
8262 typename KernelFunctionType,
8263 typename RangeNumberType,
8264 typename KernelNumberType,
8265 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
8266void
8267fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_serial(
8268 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
8269 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
8270 &aca_config,
8271 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, KernelNumberType> &kernel,
8272 const KernelNumberType kernel_factor,
8273 const typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type
8274 mass_matrix_factor,
8275 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8276 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8277 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
8278 const QGauss<dim> &mass_matrix_quadrature_formula,
8279 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
8280 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
8281 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8282 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8283 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8284 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8285 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8286 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8287 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
8288 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
8289 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
8290 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
8291 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
8292{
8293 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
8294 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
8295 static_assert(
8296 std::is_same<
8297 real_type,
8298 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
8299
8317 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
8318 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8319 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8320 mappings,
8321 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
8322 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
8323 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
8324 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
8325
8326 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
8327
8331 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
8332 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
8333
8338 CellWiseScratchDataForMassMatrix<dim, spacedim> mass_matrix_scratch_data(
8339 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8340 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8341 mass_matrix_quadrature_formula,
8342 update_values | update_JxW_values);
8343
8349 PairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> scratch_data(
8350 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe(), mappings, bem_values);
8351 PairCellWisePerTaskData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType> copy_data(
8352 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(), ky_dof_handler.get_fe());
8353
8357 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8358 CUDAPairCellWiseScratchData<dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType>
8359 scratch_data_gpu;
8360 scratch_data_gpu.allocate(scratch_data);
8361
8362 for (HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *leaf_mat : hmat.get_leaf_set())
8363 {
8364 fill_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(
8365 leaf_mat,
8366 aca_config,
8367 kernel,
8368 kernel_factor,
8369 mass_matrix_factor,
8370 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8371 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8372 bem_values_gpu,
8373 kx_dof_handler,
8374 ky_dof_handler,
8375 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8376 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8377 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8378 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8379 mappings,
8380 material_id_to_mapping_index,
8381 normal_detector,
8382 mass_matrix_scratch_data,
8383 scratch_data,
8384 scratch_data_gpu,
8385 copy_data,
8386 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
8387 }
8388
8392 bem_values_gpu.release();
8393
8397 scratch_data.release();
8398 scratch_data_gpu.release(scratch_data.cuda_stream_handle);
8399 copy_data.release();
8400}
8401
8402
8447template <int dim,
8448 int spacedim,
8449 template <int, typename>
8450 typename KernelFunctionType,
8451 typename RangeNumberType,
8452 typename KernelNumberType,
8453 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
8454void
8455fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_smp(
8456 const unsigned int thread_num,
8457 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
8458 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
8459 &aca_config,
8460 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
8461 &kernel,
8462 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
8463 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8464 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8465 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
8466 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
8467 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
8468 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8469 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8470 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8471 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8472 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8473 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8474 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
8475 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
8476 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
8477 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
8478 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
8479{
8480 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
8481 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
8482 static_assert(
8483 std::is_same<
8484 real_type,
8485 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
8486
8487 LogStream::Prefix prefix_string("build_hmatrix_aca");
8488#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
8489 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range("build_hmatrix_aca");
8490#endif
8491
8492 Timer timer;
8493
8510 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
8511 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8512 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8513 mappings,
8514 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
8515 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
8516 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
8517 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
8518
8519 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
8520
8524 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
8525 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
8526
8527 timer.stop();
8528 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "compute BEM values");
8529
8534 timer.start();
8535
8536 const unsigned int block_size = 256;
8537 const unsigned int block_num = 8;
8538 const unsigned int batch_size = block_size * block_num;
8539 const unsigned int capacity = batch_size * 8 + 1;
8540 unsigned int producer_thread_num =
8541 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(4), thread_num / 2);
8542
8543 // Create ring buffers for various cell neighboring types.
8544 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8545 dim,
8546 spacedim,
8547 RangeNumberType,
8548 KernelNumberType>
8549 ring_buffer_for_same_panel;
8550 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.allocate(CellNeighboringType::SamePanel,
8551 batch_size,
8552 bem_values);
8553 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8554 dim,
8555 spacedim,
8556 RangeNumberType,
8557 KernelNumberType>
8558 ring_buffer_for_common_edge;
8559 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonEdge,
8560 batch_size,
8561 bem_values);
8562 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8563 dim,
8564 spacedim,
8565 RangeNumberType,
8566 KernelNumberType>
8567 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex;
8568 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonVertex,
8569 batch_size,
8570 bem_values);
8571 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8572 dim,
8573 spacedim,
8574 RangeNumberType,
8575 KernelNumberType>
8576 ring_buffer_for_regular;
8577 ring_buffer_for_regular.allocate(CellNeighboringType::Regular,
8578 batch_size,
8579 bem_values);
8580
8581 std::mutex result_lock;
8582
8583 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &near_field_leaf_set =
8584 hmat.get_near_field_leaf_set();
8585 const unsigned int near_field_set_size = near_field_leaf_set.size();
8586
8587 Assert(near_field_set_size > 0, ExcLowerRange(near_field_set_size, 1));
8588
8589 if (near_field_set_size < producer_thread_num)
8590 producer_thread_num = near_field_set_size;
8591
8592 std::vector<std::thread> producers;
8593 producers.reserve(producer_thread_num);
8594
8595 // Use sequence partition to generate closed ranges of near field H-matrix
8596 // nodes.
8597 std::vector<double> near_field_leaf_set_storage(near_field_set_size);
8598 hmat.compute_near_field_leaf_set_assembly_task_costs(
8599 near_field_leaf_set_storage);
8600 // Generate the cost function for sequence partition, which accumulates the
8601 // memory costs for all H-matrix leaf nodes in the closed range [i,j].
8602 auto near_field_storage_cost_func =
8603 [&near_field_leaf_set_storage](int64_t i, int64_t j) -> double {
8604 double sum = 0.0;
8605 for (int64_t k = i; k <= j; k++)
8606 {
8607 sum += near_field_leaf_set_storage[k];
8608 }
8609 return sum;
8610 };
8611
8612 SequencePartitioner<decltype(near_field_storage_cost_func)>
8613 near_field_storage_sp(near_field_set_size,
8614 producer_thread_num,
8615 near_field_storage_cost_func);
8616 near_field_storage_sp.partition();
8617 std::vector<std::pair<int64_t, int64_t>> near_field_partitions;
8618 near_field_storage_sp.get_partitions(near_field_partitions);
8619
8623 for (const auto &partition : near_field_partitions)
8624 {
8625 producers.emplace_back([&]() {
8626 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8627 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_producer(
8628 near_field_leaf_set,
8629 partition.first,
8630 partition.second + 1,
8631 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
8632 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
8633 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
8634 ring_buffer_for_regular,
8635 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
8636 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
8637 bem_values,
8638 kx_dof_handler,
8639 ky_dof_handler,
8640 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8641 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8642 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8643 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8644 mappings,
8645 material_id_to_mapping_index,
8646 normal_detector,
8647 kernel.is_symmetric(),
8648 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
8649 });
8650 }
8651
8655 std::vector<std::thread> consumers;
8656 const unsigned int consumer_multiplicity =
8657 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(1), thread_num / 2 / 4);
8658 consumers.reserve(4 * consumer_multiplicity);
8659
8660 for (unsigned int m = 0; m < consumer_multiplicity; m++)
8661 {
8662 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
8663 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8664 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
8665 kernel,
8666 kernel_factor,
8667 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
8668 bem_values_gpu,
8669 result_lock,
8670 block_size);
8671 });
8672
8673 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
8674 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8675 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
8676 kernel,
8677 kernel_factor,
8678 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
8679 bem_values_gpu,
8680 result_lock,
8681 block_size);
8682 });
8683
8684 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
8685 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8686 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
8687 kernel,
8688 kernel_factor,
8689 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
8690 bem_values_gpu,
8691 result_lock,
8692 block_size);
8693 });
8694
8695 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
8696 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
8697 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
8698 kernel,
8699 kernel_factor,
8700 ring_buffer_for_regular,
8701 bem_values_gpu,
8702 result_lock,
8703 block_size);
8704 });
8705 }
8706
8710 for (auto &producer : producers)
8711 producer.join();
8712
8713 {
8714 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_same_panel.buffer_lock);
8715 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
8716 }
8717 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
8718
8719 {
8720 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_edge.buffer_lock);
8721 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
8722 }
8723 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
8724
8725 {
8726 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.buffer_lock);
8727 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
8728 }
8729 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
8730
8731 {
8732 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_regular.buffer_lock);
8733 ring_buffer_for_regular.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
8734 }
8735 ring_buffer_for_regular.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
8736
8737 for (auto &consumer : consumers)
8738 consumer.join();
8739
8743 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.release();
8744 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.release();
8745 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.release();
8746 ring_buffer_for_regular.release();
8747
8748 timer.stop();
8749 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build near field H-matrix nodes");
8750
8755 timer.start();
8756
8757 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &far_field_leaf_set =
8758 hmat.get_far_field_leaf_set();
8759
8760 if (far_field_leaf_set.size() > 0)
8761 {
8762#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
8763 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
8764 "build far field hmatrix nodes");
8765#endif
8766
8767 const unsigned int grain_size =
8768 std::max(static_cast<unsigned long>(1),
8769 far_field_leaf_set.size() / thread_num / 2);
8770 tbb::parallel_for(
8771 tbb::blocked_range<
8772 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>(
8773 far_field_leaf_set.begin(), far_field_leaf_set.end(), grain_size),
8774 [&](const tbb::blocked_range<typename std::vector<
8775 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator> &range) {
8776 fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_subrange_with_aca_plus<
8777 dim,
8778 spacedim,
8779 KernelFunctionType,
8780 RangeNumberType,
8781 KernelNumberType,
8782 SurfaceNormalDetector>(range,
8783 aca_config,
8784 kernel,
8785 kernel_factor,
8786 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8787 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8788 bem_values,
8789 bem_values_gpu,
8790 kx_dof_handler,
8791 ky_dof_handler,
8792 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8793 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8794 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8795 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8796 mappings,
8797 material_id_to_mapping_index,
8798 normal_detector,
8799 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
8800 },
8801 tbb::auto_partitioner());
8802 }
8803
8804 timer.stop();
8805 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build far field H-matrix nodes");
8806
8810 bem_values_gpu.release();
8811}
8812
8813
8863template <int dim,
8864 int spacedim,
8865 template <int, typename>
8866 typename KernelFunctionType,
8867 typename RangeNumberType,
8868 typename KernelNumberType,
8869 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
8870void
8871fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_smp(
8872 const unsigned int thread_num,
8873 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
8874 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
8875 &aca_config,
8876 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
8877 &kernel,
8878 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
8879 const std::vector<Vector<KernelNumberType>> &mass_vmult_weq,
8880 const KernelNumberType stabilization_factor,
8881 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
8882 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
8883 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
8884 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
8885 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
8886 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8887 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8888 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
8889 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
8890 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
8891 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
8892 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
8893 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
8894 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
8895 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
8896 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
8897{
8898 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
8899 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
8900 static_assert(
8901 std::is_same<
8902 real_type,
8903 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
8904
8905 LogStream::Prefix prefix_string("build_hmatrix_aca with stabilization");
8906#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
8907 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
8908 "build_hmatrix_aca with stabilization");
8909#endif
8910
8911 Timer timer;
8912
8930 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
8931 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8932 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
8933 mappings,
8934 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
8935 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
8936 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
8937 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
8938
8939 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
8940
8944 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
8945 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
8946
8947 timer.stop();
8948 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "compute BEM values");
8949
8954 timer.start();
8955
8956 const unsigned int block_size = 256;
8957 const unsigned int block_num = 8;
8958 const unsigned int batch_size = block_size * block_num;
8959 const unsigned int capacity = batch_size * 8 + 1;
8960 unsigned int producer_thread_num =
8961 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(4), thread_num / 2);
8962
8963 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8964 dim,
8965 spacedim,
8966 RangeNumberType,
8967 KernelNumberType>
8968 ring_buffer_for_same_panel;
8969 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.allocate(CellNeighboringType::SamePanel,
8970 batch_size,
8971 bem_values);
8972 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8973 dim,
8974 spacedim,
8975 RangeNumberType,
8976 KernelNumberType>
8977 ring_buffer_for_common_edge;
8978 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonEdge,
8979 batch_size,
8980 bem_values);
8981 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8982 dim,
8983 spacedim,
8984 RangeNumberType,
8985 KernelNumberType>
8986 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex;
8987 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonVertex,
8988 batch_size,
8989 bem_values);
8990 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
8991 dim,
8992 spacedim,
8993 RangeNumberType,
8994 KernelNumberType>
8995 ring_buffer_for_regular;
8996 ring_buffer_for_regular.allocate(CellNeighboringType::Regular,
8997 batch_size,
8998 bem_values);
8999
9000 std::mutex result_lock;
9001
9002 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &near_field_leaf_set =
9003 hmat.get_near_field_leaf_set();
9004 const unsigned int near_field_set_size = near_field_leaf_set.size();
9005
9006 Assert(near_field_set_size > 0, ExcLowerRange(near_field_set_size, 1));
9007
9008 if (near_field_set_size < producer_thread_num)
9009 producer_thread_num = near_field_set_size;
9010
9011 std::vector<std::thread> producers;
9012 producers.reserve(producer_thread_num);
9013
9014 // Use sequence partition to generate closed ranges of near field H-matrix
9015 // nodes.
9016 std::vector<double> near_field_leaf_set_storage(near_field_set_size);
9017 hmat.compute_near_field_leaf_set_assembly_task_costs(
9018 near_field_leaf_set_storage);
9019 // Generate the cost function for sequence partition, which accumulates the
9020 // memory costs for all H-matrix leaf nodes in the closed range [i,j].
9021 auto near_field_storage_cost_func =
9022 [&near_field_leaf_set_storage](int64_t i, int64_t j) -> double {
9023 double sum = 0.0;
9024 for (int64_t k = i; k <= j; k++)
9025 {
9026 sum += near_field_leaf_set_storage[k];
9027 }
9028 return sum;
9029 };
9030
9031 SequencePartitioner<decltype(near_field_storage_cost_func)>
9032 near_field_storage_sp(near_field_set_size,
9033 producer_thread_num,
9034 near_field_storage_cost_func);
9035 near_field_storage_sp.partition();
9036 std::vector<std::pair<int64_t, int64_t>> near_field_partitions;
9037 near_field_storage_sp.get_partitions(near_field_partitions);
9038
9042 for (const auto &partition : near_field_partitions)
9043 {
9044 producers.emplace_back([&]() {
9045 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9046 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_producer(
9047 near_field_leaf_set,
9048 partition.first,
9049 partition.second + 1,
9050 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
9051 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
9052 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
9053 ring_buffer_for_regular,
9054 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
9055 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
9056 bem_values,
9057 kx_dof_handler,
9058 ky_dof_handler,
9059 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9060 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9061 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
9062 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
9063 mappings,
9064 material_id_to_mapping_index,
9065 normal_detector,
9066 kernel.is_symmetric(),
9067 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
9068 });
9069 }
9070
9074 std::vector<std::thread> consumers;
9075 const unsigned int consumer_multiplicity =
9076 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(1), thread_num / 2 / 4);
9077 consumers.reserve(4 * consumer_multiplicity);
9078
9079 for (unsigned int m = 0; m < consumer_multiplicity; m++)
9080 {
9081 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9082 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9083 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9084 kernel,
9085 kernel_factor,
9086 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
9087 bem_values_gpu,
9088 result_lock,
9089 block_size);
9090 });
9091
9092 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9093 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9094 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9095 kernel,
9096 kernel_factor,
9097 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
9098 bem_values_gpu,
9099 result_lock,
9100 block_size);
9101 });
9102
9103 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9104 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9105 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9106 kernel,
9107 kernel_factor,
9108 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
9109 bem_values_gpu,
9110 result_lock,
9111 block_size);
9112 });
9113
9114 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9115 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9116 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9117 kernel,
9118 kernel_factor,
9119 ring_buffer_for_regular,
9120 bem_values_gpu,
9121 result_lock,
9122 block_size);
9123 });
9124 }
9125
9129 for (auto &producer : producers)
9130 producer.join();
9131
9132 {
9133 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_same_panel.buffer_lock);
9134 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9135 }
9136 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9137
9138 {
9139 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_edge.buffer_lock);
9140 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9141 }
9142 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9143
9144 {
9145 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.buffer_lock);
9146 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9147 }
9148 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9149
9150 {
9151 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_regular.buffer_lock);
9152 ring_buffer_for_regular.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9153 }
9154 ring_buffer_for_regular.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9155
9156 for (auto &consumer : consumers)
9157 consumer.join();
9158
9162 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.release();
9163 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.release();
9164 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.release();
9165 ring_buffer_for_regular.release();
9166
9167 {
9168#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
9169 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
9170 "regularize hypersingular kernel");
9171#endif
9172
9173 const unsigned int grain_size =
9174 std::max(static_cast<unsigned long>(1),
9175 near_field_leaf_set.size() / thread_num / 2);
9176 tbb::parallel_for(
9177 tbb::blocked_range<
9178 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>(
9179 near_field_leaf_set.begin(), near_field_leaf_set.end(), grain_size),
9180 [&](const tbb::blocked_range<typename std::vector<
9181 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator> &range) {
9182 stabilize_near_field_hmatrices_for_hypersingular_kernel<
9183 spacedim,
9184 RangeNumberType,
9185 KernelNumberType>(range,
9186 mass_vmult_weq,
9187 stabilization_factor,
9188 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
9189 },
9190 tbb::auto_partitioner());
9191 }
9192
9193 timer.stop();
9194 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build near field H-matrix nodes");
9195
9200 timer.start();
9201
9202 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &far_field_leaf_set =
9203 hmat.get_far_field_leaf_set();
9204
9205 if (far_field_leaf_set.size() > 0)
9206 {
9207#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
9208 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
9209 "build far field hmatrix nodes");
9210#endif
9211
9212 const unsigned int grain_size =
9213 std::max(static_cast<unsigned long>(1),
9214 far_field_leaf_set.size() / thread_num / 2);
9215 tbb::parallel_for(
9216 tbb::blocked_range<
9217 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>(
9218 far_field_leaf_set.begin(), far_field_leaf_set.end(), grain_size),
9219 [&](const tbb::blocked_range<typename std::vector<
9220 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator> &range) {
9221 fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_subrange_with_aca_plus<
9222 dim,
9223 spacedim,
9224 KernelFunctionType,
9225 RangeNumberType,
9226 KernelNumberType,
9227 SurfaceNormalDetector>(range,
9228 aca_config,
9229 kernel,
9230 kernel_factor,
9231 mass_vmult_weq,
9232 stabilization_factor,
9233 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
9234 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
9235 bem_values,
9236 bem_values_gpu,
9237 kx_dof_handler,
9238 ky_dof_handler,
9239 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9240 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9241 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
9242 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
9243 mappings,
9244 material_id_to_mapping_index,
9245 normal_detector,
9246 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
9247 },
9248 tbb::auto_partitioner());
9249 }
9250
9251 timer.stop();
9252 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build far field H-matrix nodes");
9253
9257 bem_values_gpu.release();
9258}
9259
9260
9310template <int dim,
9311 int spacedim,
9312 template <int, typename>
9313 typename KernelFunctionType,
9314 typename RangeNumberType,
9315 typename KernelNumberType,
9316 typename SurfaceNormalDetector>
9317void
9318fill_hmatrix_with_aca_plus_smp(
9319 const unsigned int thread_num,
9320 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> &hmat,
9321 const ACAConfig<typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type>
9322 &aca_config,
9323 const KernelFunctionType<spacedim, DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType>>
9324 &kernel,
9325 const DeviceNumberType<KernelNumberType> kernel_factor,
9326 const typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type
9327 mass_matrix_factor,
9328 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
9329 const DoFToCellTopology<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
9330 const SauterQuadratureRule<dim> &sauter_quad_rule,
9331 const QGauss<dim> &mass_matrix_quadrature_formula,
9332 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &kx_dof_handler,
9333 const DoFHandler<dim, spacedim> &ky_dof_handler,
9334 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
9335 *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9336 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index>
9337 *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9338 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
9339 const std::vector<types::global_dof_index> &ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
9340 const std::vector<MappingInfo<dim, spacedim> *> &mappings,
9341 const std::map<types::material_id, unsigned int>
9342 &material_id_to_mapping_index,
9343 const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector,
9344 const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat = false)
9345{
9346 using real_type = typename numbers::NumberTraits<RangeNumberType>::real_type;
9347 static_assert(is_number_larger_or_equal<RangeNumberType, KernelNumberType>());
9348 static_assert(
9349 std::is_same<
9350 real_type,
9351 typename numbers::NumberTraits<KernelNumberType>::real_type>::value);
9352
9353 LogStream::Prefix prefix_string("build_hmatrix_aca with mass matrix");
9354#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
9355 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
9356 "build_hmatrix_aca with mass matrix");
9357#endif
9358
9359 Timer timer;
9360
9378 BEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values(
9379 kx_dof_handler.get_fe(),
9380 ky_dof_handler.get_fe(),
9381 mappings,
9382 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_same_panel,
9383 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_edge,
9384 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_common_vertex,
9385 sauter_quad_rule.quad_rule_for_regular);
9386
9387 bem_values.fill_shape_function_value_tables();
9388
9392 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues<dim, spacedim, real_type> bem_values_gpu;
9393 bem_values_gpu.allocate_and_assign_from_host(bem_values);
9394
9395 timer.stop();
9396 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "compute BEM values");
9397
9402 timer.start();
9403
9404 const unsigned int block_size = 256;
9405 const unsigned int block_num = 8;
9406 const unsigned int batch_size = block_size * block_num;
9407 const unsigned int capacity = batch_size * 8 + 1;
9408 unsigned int producer_thread_num =
9409 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(4), thread_num / 2);
9410
9411 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
9412 dim,
9413 spacedim,
9414 RangeNumberType,
9415 KernelNumberType>
9416 ring_buffer_for_same_panel;
9417 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.allocate(CellNeighboringType::SamePanel,
9418 batch_size,
9419 bem_values);
9420 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
9421 dim,
9422 spacedim,
9423 RangeNumberType,
9424 KernelNumberType>
9425 ring_buffer_for_common_edge;
9426 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonEdge,
9427 batch_size,
9428 bem_values);
9429 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
9430 dim,
9431 spacedim,
9432 RangeNumberType,
9433 KernelNumberType>
9434 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex;
9435 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.allocate(CellNeighboringType::CommonVertex,
9436 batch_size,
9437 bem_values);
9438 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::SauterQuadratureTaskRingBuffer<capacity,
9439 dim,
9440 spacedim,
9441 RangeNumberType,
9442 KernelNumberType>
9443 ring_buffer_for_regular;
9444 ring_buffer_for_regular.allocate(CellNeighboringType::Regular,
9445 batch_size,
9446 bem_values);
9447
9448 std::mutex result_lock;
9449
9450 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &near_field_leaf_set =
9451 hmat.get_near_field_leaf_set();
9452 const unsigned int near_field_set_size = near_field_leaf_set.size();
9453
9454 Assert(near_field_set_size > 0, ExcLowerRange(near_field_set_size, 1));
9455
9456 if (near_field_set_size < producer_thread_num)
9457 producer_thread_num = near_field_set_size;
9458
9459 std::vector<std::thread> producers;
9460 producers.reserve(producer_thread_num);
9461
9462 // Use sequence partition to generate closed ranges of near field H-matrix
9463 // nodes.
9464 std::vector<double> near_field_leaf_set_storage(near_field_set_size);
9465 hmat.compute_near_field_leaf_set_assembly_task_costs(
9466 near_field_leaf_set_storage);
9467 // Generate the cost function for sequence partition, which accumulates the
9468 // memory costs for all H-matrix leaf nodes in the closed range [i,j].
9469 auto near_field_storage_cost_func =
9470 [&near_field_leaf_set_storage](int64_t i, int64_t j) -> double {
9471 double sum = 0.0;
9472 for (int64_t k = i; k <= j; k++)
9473 {
9474 sum += near_field_leaf_set_storage[k];
9475 }
9476 return sum;
9477 };
9478
9479 SequencePartitioner<decltype(near_field_storage_cost_func)>
9480 near_field_storage_sp(near_field_set_size,
9481 producer_thread_num,
9482 near_field_storage_cost_func);
9483 near_field_storage_sp.partition();
9484 std::vector<std::pair<int64_t, int64_t>> near_field_partitions;
9485 near_field_storage_sp.get_partitions(near_field_partitions);
9486
9490 for (const auto &partition : near_field_partitions)
9491 {
9492 producers.emplace_back([&]() {
9493 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9494 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_producer(
9495 near_field_leaf_set,
9496 partition.first,
9497 partition.second + 1,
9498 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
9499 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
9500 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
9501 ring_buffer_for_regular,
9502 mass_matrix_factor,
9503 kx_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
9504 ky_dof_to_cell_topo.topology,
9505 bem_values,
9506 mass_matrix_quadrature_formula,
9507 kx_dof_handler,
9508 ky_dof_handler,
9509 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9510 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9511 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
9512 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
9513 mappings,
9514 material_id_to_mapping_index,
9515 normal_detector,
9516 kernel.is_symmetric(),
9517 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
9518 });
9519 }
9520
9524 std::vector<std::thread> consumers;
9525 const unsigned int consumer_multiplicity =
9526 std::max(static_cast<unsigned int>(1), thread_num / 2 / 4);
9527 consumers.reserve(4 * consumer_multiplicity);
9528
9529 for (unsigned int m = 0; m < consumer_multiplicity; m++)
9530 {
9531 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9532 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9533 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9534 kernel,
9535 kernel_factor,
9536 ring_buffer_for_same_panel,
9537 bem_values_gpu,
9538 result_lock,
9539 block_size);
9540 });
9541
9542 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9543 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9544 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9545 kernel,
9546 kernel_factor,
9547 ring_buffer_for_common_edge,
9548 bem_values_gpu,
9549 result_lock,
9550 block_size);
9551 });
9552
9553 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9554 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9555 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9556 kernel,
9557 kernel_factor,
9558 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex,
9559 bem_values_gpu,
9560 result_lock,
9561 block_size);
9562 });
9563
9564 consumers.emplace_back([&]() {
9565 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::
9566 sauter_quadrature_for_near_field_matrix_entries_consumer(
9567 kernel,
9568 kernel_factor,
9569 ring_buffer_for_regular,
9570 bem_values_gpu,
9571 result_lock,
9572 block_size);
9573 });
9574 }
9575
9579 for (auto &producer : producers)
9580 producer.join();
9581
9582 {
9583 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_same_panel.buffer_lock);
9584 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9585 }
9586 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9587
9588 {
9589 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_edge.buffer_lock);
9590 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9591 }
9592 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9593
9594 {
9595 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.buffer_lock);
9596 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9597 }
9598 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9599
9600 {
9601 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lg(ring_buffer_for_regular.buffer_lock);
9602 ring_buffer_for_regular.if_all_near_field_hmat_entries_added = true;
9603 }
9604 ring_buffer_for_regular.batch_task_ready.notify_all();
9605
9606 for (auto &consumer : consumers)
9607 consumer.join();
9608
9612 ring_buffer_for_same_panel.release();
9613 ring_buffer_for_common_edge.release();
9614 ring_buffer_for_common_vertex.release();
9615 ring_buffer_for_regular.release();
9616
9617 timer.stop();
9618 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build near field H-matrix nodes");
9619
9624 timer.start();
9625
9626 std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *> &far_field_leaf_set =
9627 hmat.get_far_field_leaf_set();
9628
9629 if (far_field_leaf_set.size() > 0)
9630 {
9631#if ENABLE_NVTX == 1
9632 HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::NVTXRange nvtx_range(
9633 "build far field hmatrix nodes");
9634#endif
9635
9636 const unsigned int grain_size =
9637 std::max(static_cast<unsigned long>(1),
9638 far_field_leaf_set.size() / thread_num / 2);
9639 tbb::parallel_for(
9640 tbb::blocked_range<
9641 typename std::vector<HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator>(
9642 far_field_leaf_set.begin(), far_field_leaf_set.end(), grain_size),
9643 [&](const tbb::blocked_range<typename std::vector<
9644 HMatrix<spacedim, RangeNumberType> *>::iterator> &range) {
9645 fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_subrange_with_aca_plus<
9646 dim,
9647 spacedim,
9648 KernelFunctionType,
9649 RangeNumberType,
9650 KernelNumberType,
9651 SurfaceNormalDetector>(range,
9652 aca_config,
9653 kernel,
9654 kernel_factor,
9655 kx_dof_to_cell_topo,
9656 ky_dof_to_cell_topo,
9657 bem_values,
9658 bem_values_gpu,
9659 kx_dof_handler,
9660 ky_dof_handler,
9661 kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9662 ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices,
9663 kx_dof_i2e_numbering,
9664 ky_dof_i2e_numbering,
9665 mappings,
9666 material_id_to_mapping_index,
9667 normal_detector,
9668 enable_build_symmetric_hmat);
9669 },
9670 tbb::auto_partitioner());
9671 }
9672
9673 timer.stop();
9674 print_wall_time(deallog, timer, "build far field H-matrix nodes");
9675
9679 bem_values_gpu.release();
9680}
9681
9682HBEM_NS_CLOSE
9683
9684#endif /* HIERBEM_INCLUDE_HMATRIX_ACA_PLUS_ACA_PLUS_H_ */

fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus
void fill_far_field_hmatrix_leaf_node_with_aca_plus(HMatrix< spacedim, RangeNumberType > *leaf_mat, const ACAConfig< typename numbers::NumberTraits< RangeNumberType >::real_type > &aca_config, const KernelFunctionType< spacedim, DeviceNumberType< KernelNumberType > > &kernel, const DeviceNumberType< KernelNumberType > kernel_factor, const DoFToCellTopology< dim, spacedim > &kx_dof_to_cell_topo, const DoFToCellTopology< dim, spacedim > &ky_dof_to_cell_topo, const BEMValues< dim, spacedim, typename numbers::NumberTraits< RangeNumberType >::real_type > &bem_values, const HierBEM::CUDAWrappers::CUDABEMValues< dim, spacedim, typename numbers::NumberTraits< RangeNumberType >::real_type > &bem_values_gpu, const std::vector< types::global_dof_index > *kx_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices, const std::vector< types::global_dof_index > *ky_map_from_local_to_full_dof_indices, const std::vector< types::global_dof_index > &kx_dof_i2e_numbering, const std::vector< types::global_dof_index > &ky_dof_i2e_numbering, const std::vector< MappingInfo< dim, spacedim > * > &mappings, const std::map< types::material_id, unsigned int > &material_id_to_mapping_index, const SurfaceNormalDetector &normal_detector, PairCellWiseScratchData< dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType > &scratch_data, PairCellWisePerTaskData< dim, spacedim, KernelNumberType > &copy_data, const bool enable_build_symmetric_hmat=false)
